word.greekot: τοῦ δαυιδ πρὸς σέ κύριε ἐκέκραξα ὁ θεός μου μὴ παρασιωπήσῃς ἀπ' ἐμοῦ μήποτε παρασιωπήσῃς ἀπ' ἐμοῦ καὶ ὁμοιωθήσομαι τοῖς καταβαίνουσιν εἰς λάκκον

word.kjv: Though an host should encamp against me, my heart shall not fear: though war should rise against me, in this will I be confident.
word.thailand: แม้กองทัพตั้งค่ายสู้ข้าพเจ้า จิตใจของข้าพเจ้าจะไม่กลัว แม้ข้าพเจ้าจะได้รับภัยสงคราม ข้าพเจ้ายังไว้ใจได้อยู่
word.spanish1909: Aunque se asiente campo contra mí, No temerá mi corazón: Aunque contra mí se levante guerra, Yo en esto confío.
word.latinvulgate: Ne simul trahas me cum peccatoribus, et cum operantibus iniquitatem ne perdas me ; qui loquuntur pacem cum proximo suo, mala autem in cordibus eorum.
word.italian1927: Quand’anche un esercito si accampasse contro a me, il mio cuore non avrebbe paura; quand’anche la guerra si levasse contro a me, anche allora sarei fiducioso.
word.german1912: Wenn sich schon ein Heer wider mich legt, so fürchtet sich dennoch mein Herz nicht; wenn sich Krieg wider mich erhebt, so verlasse ich mich auf ihn.
word.french1910: Si une armée se campait contre moi, Mon coeur n'aurait aucune crainte; Si une guerre s'élevait contre moi, Je serais malgré cela plein de confiance.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 雖有軍兵紮營攻擊我，我的心也不害怕；雖然發動戰爭攻擊我，我仍舊安穩。
word.korean: 군대가 나를 대적하여 진 칠지라도 내 마음이 두렵지 아니하며 전쟁이 일어나 나를 치려 할지라도 내가 오히려 안연하리로다
word.tagalog: Bagaman ang isang hukbo ay humantong laban sa akin, hindi matatakot ang aking puso: bagaman magbangon ang pagdidigma laban sa akin, gayon ma'y titiwala rin ako.
word.maori: Ahakoa whakapae noa te ope i ahau e kore toku ngakau e wehi: ahakoa ara noa te pakanga ki ahau, ka au tonu ia ahau.
word.cebuano: Bisan ang usa ka dakung panon magapahamutang batok kanako, Dili mahadlok ang akong kasingkasing: Bisan ang gubat patindogon batok kanako, Bisan pa niini ako masaligon.
word.hebrew: ג  אם-תחנה עלי מחנה--    לא-יירא לבי אם-תקום עלי מלחמה--    בזאת אני בוטח
word.hebrewmodern: אם תחנה עלי מחנה לא יירא לבי אם תקום עלי מלחמה בזאת אני בוטח׃
word.greekot: μὴ συνελκύσῃς μετὰ ἁμαρτωλῶν τὴν ψυχήν μου καὶ μετὰ ἐργαζομένων ἀδικίαν μὴ συναπολέσῃς με τῶν λαλούντων εἰρήνην μετὰ τῶν πλησίον αὐτῶν κακὰ δὲ ἐν ταῖς καρδίαις αὐτῶν

word.kjv: I was a reproach among all mine enemies, but especially among my neighbours, and a fear to mine acquaintance: they that did see me without fled from me.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์เป็นที่นินทาท่ามกลางบรรดาปฏิปักษ์ของข้าพระองค์ โดยเฉพาะท่ามกลางเพื่อนบ้านของข้าพระองค์ เป็นเรื่องน่าครั่นคร้ามของผู้ที่คุ้นเคย ผู้ที่เห็นข้าพระองค์ในถนนก็หนีข้าพระองค์ไป
word.spanish1909: De todos mis enemigos he sido oprobio, Y de mis vecinos en gran manera, y horror á mis conocidos: Los que me veían fuera, huían de mí.
word.latinvulgate: Lætamini in Domino, et exsultate, justi ; et gloriamini, omnes recti corde.
word.italian1927: A cagione di tutti i miei nemici son diventato un obbrobrio, un grande obbrobrio ai miei vicini, e uno spavento ai miei conoscenti. Quelli che mi veggono fuori fuggon lungi da me.
word.german1912: Es geht mir so übel, daß ich bin eine große Schmach geworden meinen Nachbarn und eine Scheu meinen Verwandten; die mich sehen auf der Gasse, fliehen vor mir.
word.french1910: Tous mes adversaires m'ont rendu un objet d'opprobre, De grand opprobre pour mes voisins, et de terreur pour mes amis; Ceux qui me voient dehors s'enfuient loin de moi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我因眾仇敵的緣故，成了眾人羞辱的對象，在我的鄰居面前更是這樣；認識我的人都懼怕我；在街上看見我的，都避開我。
word.korean: 내가 모든 대적으로 말미암아 욕을 당하고 내 이웃에게서는 심히 당하니 내 친구가 놀라고 길에서 보는 자가 나를 피하였나이다
word.tagalog: Dahil sa lahat ng aking mga kaaway ay naging kaduwahagihan ako, Oo, lubha nga sa aking mga kapuwa, at takot sa aking mga kakilala: silang nangakakita sa akin sa labas ay tinakasan ako.
word.maori: He tawainga ahau na oku hoariri katoa; ko te tino mahi ia tena a oku hoa noho tata, he mea wehi ahau na nga tangata i mohio ki ahau: ko te hunga i kite i ahau i waho, rere ana i ahau.
word.cebuano: Tungod sa tanan ko nga mga kabatok nahimo ako nga usa ka talamayon, Oo, talamayon nga hilabihan sa akong isigkatawo, Ug usa ka kalisang ako sa akong mga kaila: Ang mga nakakita kanako sa gawas, nanagpangalagiw gikan kanako.
word.hebrew: יא  כי כלו ביגון חיי--    ושנותי באנחה כשל בעוני כחי    ועצמי עששו
word.hebrewmodern: מכל צררי הייתי חרפה ולשכני מאד ופחד למידעי ראי בחוץ נדדו ממני׃
word.greekot: εὐφράνθητε ἐπὶ κύριον καὶ ἀγαλλιᾶσθε δίκαιοι καὶ καυχᾶσθε πάντες οἱ εὐθεῖς τῇ καρδίᾳ

word.kjv: For I have heard the slander of many: fear was on every side: while they took counsel together against me, they devised to take away my life.
word.thailand: พระเจ้าข้า ข้าพระองค์ได้ยินเสียงซุบซิบของคนเป็นอันมาก มีความสยดสยองอยู่ทุกด้าน ขณะเมื่อเขาร่วมกันคิดแผนการต่อสู้ข้าพระองค์ ขณะที่เขาปองร้ายชีวิตของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Porque he oído afrenta de muchos; Miedo por todas partes, Cuando consultaban juntos contra mí, E ideaban quitarme la vida.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Perché odo il diffamare di molti, spavento m’è d’ogn’intorno, mentr’essi si consigliano a mio danno, e macchinano di tormi la vita.
word.german1912: Denn ich höre, wie mich viele schelten, Schrecken ist um und um; sie ratschlagen miteinander über mich und denken, mir das Leben zu nehmen.
word.french1910: J'apprends les mauvais propos de plusieurs, L'épouvante qui règne à l'entour, Quand ils se concertent ensemble contre moi: Ils complotent de m'ôter la vie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我聽見許多人的毀謗，四周都有驚嚇；他們一同商議攻擊我，圖謀要取我的性命。
word.korean: 내가 무리의 비방을 들으오며 사방에 두려움이 있나이다 저희가 나를 치려 의논할 때에 내 생명을 빼앗기로 꾀하였나이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't aking narinig ang paninirang puri ng marami, kakilabutan sa bawa't dako. Samantalang sila'y nagsasangguniang magkakasama laban sa akin, kanilang pinagsisikapang alisin ang aking buhay.
word.maori: I rongo hoki ahau i te ngautuara a te tini; i karapotia ahau e te wehi: i a ratou e runanga ana ki te he moku, i mea kia whakamatea ahau.
word.cebuano: Kay nadungog ko ang pagtamay sa daghan, Kahadlok sa tagsatagsa nga kiliran: Samtang nanagsabut sila pagtingub batok kanako, Nanaglalang sila sa pagkuha sa akong kinabuhi.
word.hebrew: יג  נשכחתי כמת מלב    הייתי ככלי אבד
word.hebrewmodern: כי שמעתי דבת רבים מגור מסביב בהוסדם יחד עלי לקחת נפשי זממו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Oh how great is thy goodness, which thou hast laid up for them that fear thee; which thou hast wrought for them that trust in thee before the sons of men!
word.thailand: ความดีของพระองค์อุดมสักเท่าใดที่พระองค์ทรงสะสมไว้เพื่อบรรดาผู้ที่เกรงกลัวพระองค์ และทรงกระทำไว้เพื่อผู้ที่วางใจในพระองค์ ต่อหน้าบุตรทั้งหลายของมนุษย์
word.spanish1909: Cuán grande es tu bien, que has guardado para los que te temen, Que has obrado para los que esperan en ti, delante de los hijos de los hombres!
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Quant’è grande la bontà che tu riserbi a quelli che ti temono, e di cui dài prova in presenza de’ figliuoli degli uomini, verso quelli che si confidano in te!
word.german1912: Wie groß ist deine Güte, die du verborgen hast für die, so dich fürchten, und erzeigest vor den Leuten denen, die auf dich trauen!
word.french1910: Oh! combien est grande ta bonté, Que tu tiens en réserve pour ceux qui te craignent, Que tu témoignes à ceux qui cherchent en toi leur refuge, A la vue des fils de l'homme!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！你為敬畏你的人所珍藏的好處，為投靠你的人在世人面前所施行的恩惠，是多麼豐盛。
word.korean: 주를 두려워하는 자를 위하여 쌓아 두신 은혜 곧 인생 앞에서 주께 피하는 자를 위하여 베푸신 은혜가 어찌 그리 큰지요
word.tagalog: Oh pagkadakila ng iyong kabutihan, na iyong iningatan para sa kanila na nangatatakot sa iyo, na iyong ginawa sa kanila na nagsisipagkanlong sa iyo, sa harap ng mga anak ng mga tao!
word.maori: ¶ Ano te nui o tau pai kua rongoatia nei e koe mo te hunga e wehi ana ki a koe; i mahia nei e koe mo te hunga e whakawhirinaki ana ki a koe i te aroaro o nga tama a te tangata!
word.cebuano: Oh pagkadaku sa imong kaayo, Nga gitagana mo sa mga magakahadlok kanimo, Nga gibuhat mo alang kanila nga nagadangup kanimo, Sa atubangan sa mga anak nga lalake sa mga tawo!
word.hebrew: יט  תאלמנה שפתי-שקר    הדברות על-צדיק עתק--בגאוה ובוז
word.hebrewmodern: מה רב טובך אשר צפנת ליראיך פעלת לחסים בך נגד בני אדם׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Let all the earth fear the LORD: let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him.
word.thailand: ให้แผ่นดินโลกทั้งสิ้นยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์ ให้บรรดาชาวพิภพทั้งปวงยืนตะลึงพรึงเพริดต่อพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Tema á Jehová toda la tierra: Teman de él todos los habitadores del mundo.
word.latinvulgate: Immittet angelus Domini in circuitu timentium eum, et eripiet eos.
word.italian1927: Tutta la terra tema l’Eterno; lo paventino tutti gli abitanti del mondo.
word.german1912: Alle Welt fürchte den Herrn; und vor ihm scheue sich alles, was auf dem Erdboden wohnt.
word.french1910: Que toute la terre craigne l'Eternel! Que tous les habitants du monde tremblent devant lui!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願全地都敬畏耶和華，願世上的居民都懼怕他。
word.korean: 온 땅은 여호와를 두려워 하며 세계의 모든 거민은 그를 경외할지어다
word.tagalog: Matakot nawa ang buong lupa sa Panginoon: magsitayo nawang may takot ang lahat ng taga sanglibutan sa kaniya.
word.maori: Kia wehi te whenua katoa ki a Ihowa; kia ohooho nga tangata katoa o te ao ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Pahadloka kang Jehova ang tibook nga yuta: Patindoga nga may kataha kaniya ang tanang mga pumoluyo sa kalibutan.
word.hebrew: ח  ייראו מיהוה כל-הארץ    ממנו יגורו כל-ישבי תבל
word.hebrewmodern: ייראו מיהוה כל הארץ ממנו יגורו כל ישבי תבל׃
word.greekot: παρεμβαλεῖ ἄγγελος κυρίου κύκλῳ τῶν φοβουμένων αὐτὸν καὶ ῥύσεται αὐτούς

word.kjv: Behold, the eye of the LORD is upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy;
word.thailand: ดูเถิด พระเนตรของพระเยโฮวาห์อยู่เหนือผู้ที่ยำเกรงพระองค์ เหนือผู้ที่หวังในความเมตตาของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: He aquí, el ojo de Jehová sobre los que le temen, Sobre los que esperan en su misericordia;
word.latinvulgate: Clamaverunt justi, et Dominus exaudivit eos ; et ex omnibus tribulationibus eorum liberavit eos.
word.italian1927: Ecco, l’occhio dell’Eterno è su quelli che lo temono, su quelli che sperano nella sua benignità,
word.german1912: Siehe, des HERRN Auge sieht auf die, so ihn fürchten, die auf seine Güte hoffen,
word.french1910: Voici, l'oeil de l'Eternel est sur ceux qui le craignent, Sur ceux qui espèrent en sa bonté,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的眼睛看顧敬畏他的人，和那些仰望他慈愛的人；
word.korean: 여호와는 그 경외하는 자 곧 그 인자하심을 바라는 자를 살피사
word.tagalog: Narito, ang mata ng Panginoon ay nasa kanila na nangatatakot sa kaniya, sa kanila na nagsisiasa sa kaniyang kagandahang-loob;
word.maori: Nana, kei runga i te hunga e wehi ana i a ia te kanohi o Ihowa, kei te hunga e tumanako ana ki tana mahi tohu;
word.cebuano: Ania karon, ang mata ni Jehova anaa sa ibabaw sa mga nagakahadlok kaniya, Sa ibabaw sa mga nagasalig sa iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot;
word.hebrew: יח  הנה עין יהוה אל-יראיו    למיחלים לחסדו
word.hebrewmodern: הנה עין יהוה אל יראיו למיחלים לחסדו׃
word.greekot: ἐκέκραξαν οἱ δίκαιοι καὶ ὁ κύριος εἰσήκουσεν αὐτῶν καὶ ἐκ πασῶν τῶν θλίψεων αὐτῶν ἐρρύσατο αὐτούς

word.kjv: I sought the LORD, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.
word.thailand: ข้าพเจ้าได้แสวงพระเยโฮวาห์ และพระองค์ทรงฟังข้าพเจ้า และทรงช่วยข้าพเจ้าให้พ้นจากความกลัวทั้งสิ้นของข้าพเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Busqué á Jehová, y él me oyó, Y libróme de todos mis temores.
word.latinvulgate: Confundantur et revereantur quærentes animam meam ; avertantur retrorsum et confundantur cogitantes mihi mala.
word.italian1927: Io ho cercato l’Eterno, ed egli m’ha risposto e m’ha liberato da tutti i miei spaventi.
word.german1912: Da ich den HERRN suchte, antwortete er mir und errettete mich aus aller meiner Furcht.
word.french1910: J'ai cherché l'Eternel, et il m'a répondu; Il m'a délivré de toutes mes frayeurs.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我曾求問耶和華，他應允了我，救我脫離一切恐懼。
word.korean: 내가 여호와께 구하매 내게 응답하시고 내 모든 두려움에서 나를 건지셨도다
word.tagalog: Aking hinanap ang Panginoon, at sinagot niya ako, at iniligtas niya ako sa lahat ng aking mga katakutan.
word.maori: I rapu ahau i a Ihowa, a rongo mai ana ia ki ahau, whakaorangia ana ahau e ia i oku wehi katoa.
word.cebuano: Gipangita ko si Jehova, ug gitubag niya ako, Ug giluwas niya ako gikan sa tanan ko nga mga kahadlok.
word.hebrew: ד  גדלו ליהוה אתי    ונרוממה שמו יחדו
word.hebrewmodern: דרשתי את יהוה וענני ומכל מגורותי הצילני׃
word.greekot: αἰσχυνθήτωσαν καὶ ἐντραπήτωσαν οἱ ζητοῦντες τὴν ψυχήν μου ἀποστραφήτωσαν εἰς τὰ ὀπίσω καὶ καταισχυνθήτωσαν οἱ λογιζόμενοί μοι κακά

word.kjv: The angel of the LORD encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.
word.thailand: ทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์ได้ตั้งค่ายล้อมบรรดาผู้ที่เกรงกลัวพระองค์ และช่วยเขาทั้งหลายให้รอด
word.spanish1909: El ángel de Jehová acampa en derredor de los que le temen, Y los defiende.
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam gratis absconderunt mihi interitum laquei sui, supervacue exprobraverunt animam meam.
word.italian1927: L’Angelo dell’Eterno s’accampa intorno a quelli che lo temono, e li libera.
word.german1912: Der Engel des HERRN lagert sich um die her, so ihn fürchten, und hilft ihnen aus.
word.french1910: L'ange de l'Eternel campe autour de ceux qui le craignent, Et il les arrache au danger.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的使者，在敬畏他的人周圍紮營，搭救他們。
word.korean: 여호와의 사자가 주를 경외하는 자를 둘러 진치고 저희를 건지시는도다
word.tagalog: Ang anghel ng Panginoon ay humahantong sa buong palibot ng nangatatakot sa kaniya, at ipinagsasanggalang sila.
word.maori: E noho ana te anahera a Ihowa i tetahi taha, i tetahi taha, o te hunga e wehi ana i a ia, a e whakaora ana i a ratou.
word.cebuano: Ang manolonda ni Jehova magapahaluna sa paglibut sa mga nangahadlok kaniya, Ug magaluwas kanila.
word.hebrew: ז  זה עני קרא ויהוה שמע    ומכל-צרותיו הושיעו
word.hebrewmodern: חנה מלאך יהוה סביב ליראיו ויחלצם׃
word.greekot: ὅτι δωρεὰν ἔκρυψάν μοι διαφθορὰν παγίδος αὐτῶν μάτην ὠνείδισαν τὴν ψυχήν μου

word.kjv: O fear the LORD, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him.
word.thailand: ท่านวิสุทธิชนทั้งหลายของพระองค์ จงยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์ เพราะผู้ที่ยำเกรงพระองค์ไม่ขาดแคลน
word.spanish1909: Temed á Jehová, vosotros sus santos; Porque no hay falta para los que le temen.
word.latinvulgate: Anima autem mea exsultabit in Domino, et delectabitur super salutari suo.
word.italian1927: Temete l’Eterno, voi suoi santi, poiché nulla manca a quelli che lo temono.
word.german1912: Fürchtet den HERRN, ihr seine Heiligen! denn die ihn fürchten, haben keinen Mangel.
word.french1910: Craignez l'Eternel, vous ses saints! Car rien ne manque à ceux qui le craignent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的聖民哪！你們要敬畏他，因為敬畏他的一無所缺。
word.korean: 너희 성도들아 여호와를 경외하라 ! 저를 경외하는 자에게는 부족함이 없도다
word.tagalog: Oh mangatakot kayo sa Panginoon, kayong mga banal niya: sapagka't walang kakulangan sa kanila na nangatatakot sa kaniya.
word.maori: Kia wehi ki a Ihowa, e tona hunga tapu: e kore hoki e hapa nga tangata e wehi ana i a ia.
word.cebuano: Pangahadlok kamo kang Jehova, Oh kamong mga balaan niya; Kay sa mga nangahadlok kaniya wala ing makulang.
word.hebrew: ט  טעמו וראו כי-טוב יהוה    אשרי הגבר יחסה-בו
word.hebrewmodern: יראו את יהוה קדשיו כי אין מחסור ליראיו׃
word.greekot: ἡ δὲ ψυχή μου ἀγαλλιάσεται ἐπὶ τῷ κυρίῳ τερφθήσεται ἐπὶ τῷ σωτηρίῳ αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the LORD.
word.thailand: บุตรทั้งหลายเอ๋ย มาเถิด มาฟังเรา เราจะสอนเจ้าถึงความเกรงกลัวพระเยโฮวาห์
word.spanish1909: Venid, hijos, oidme; El temor de Jehová os enseñaré.
word.latinvulgate: Surgentes testes iniqui, quæ ignorabam interrogabant me.
word.italian1927: Venite, figliuoli, ascoltatemi; io v’insegnerò il timor dell’Eterno.
word.german1912: Kommt her, Kinder, höret mir zu; ich will euch die Furcht des HERRN lehren:
word.french1910: Venez, mes fils, écoutez-moi! Je vous enseignerai la crainte de l'Eternel.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 孩子們！你們要來聽我；我要教導你們敬畏耶和華。
word.korean: 너희 소자들아 와서 내게 들으라 내가 여호와를 경외함을 너희에게 가르치리로다
word.tagalog: Magsiparito kayo, kayong mga anak, dinggin ninyo ako: aking tuturuan kayo ng pagkatakot sa Panginoon.
word.maori: ¶ Haere mai, e nga tamariki, whakarongo ki ahau: maku koutou e ako kia wehi ki a Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Umari kamo, mga anak, patalinghug kamo kanako: Ang pagkahadlok kang Jehova igatudlo ko kaninyo.
word.hebrew: יא  כפירים רשו ורעבו    ודרשי יהוה לא-יחסרו כל-טוב
word.hebrewmodern: לכו בנים שמעו לי יראת יהוה אלמדכם׃
word.greekot: ἀναστάντες μάρτυρες ἄδικοι ἃ οὐκ ἐγίνωσκον ἠρώτων με

word.kjv: The transgression of the wicked saith within my heart, that there is no fear of God before his eyes.
word.thailand: การละเมิดของคนชั่วล้วงลึกเข้าไปในใจของข้าพเจ้าว่า "ในแววตาของเขาไม่มีความเกรงกลัวพระเจ้า"
word.spanish1909: Al Músico principal: Salmo de David, siervo del Señor. LA iniquidad del impío me dice al corazón: No hay temor de Dios delante de sus ojos.
word.latinvulgate: Psalmus ipsi David. Noli æmulari in malignantibus, neque zelaveris facientes iniquitatem ;
word.italian1927: Per il Capo de’ musici. Di Davide, servo dell’Eterno. L’iniquità parla all’empio nell’intimo del suo cuore; non c’è timor di Dio davanti ai suoi occhi.
word.german1912: Ein Psalm Davids, des Knechtes des HERRN, vorzusingen.  Es ist aus Grund meines Herzens von der Gottlosen Wesen gesprochen, daß keine Gottesfurcht bei ihnen ist.
word.french1910: Au chef des chantres. Du serviteur de l'Eternel, de David. La parole impie du méchant est au fond de son coeur; La crainte de Dieu n'est pas devant ses yeux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的僕人大衛的詩，交給詩班長。惡人的罪過在他心中深處說話，他眼中也不怕　神。（本節或譯：“我心中深處有話說，是關於惡人的罪過，他眼中不怕　神”）
word.korean: (여호와의 종 다윗의 시. 영장으로 한 노래) 악인의 죄얼이 내 마음에 이르기를 그 목전에는 하나님을 두려워함이 없다 하니
word.tagalog: Ang pagsalangsang ng masama ay nagsasabi sa loob ng aking puso: walang takot sa Dios sa harap ng kaniyang mga mata.
word.maori: ¶ Ki te tino kaiwhakatangi. Na te pononga a Ihowa, na Rawiri. E mea ana te mahi kino a te tangata hara i roto i toku ngakau, Kahore he wehi ki te Atua i mua i ona kanohi.
word.cebuano: Ang kalapasan sa dautan nagaingon sulod sa akong kasingkasing: Walay kahadlok sa Dios sa atubangan sa iyang mga mata.
word.hebrew: א  למנצח לעבד-יהוה לדוד
word.hebrewmodern: למנצח לעבד יהוה לדוד נאם פשע לרשע בקרב לבי אין פחד אלהים לנגד עיניו׃
word.greekot: τοῦ δαυιδ μὴ παραζήλου ἐν πονηρευομένοις μηδὲ ζήλου τοὺς ποιοῦντας τὴν ἀνομίαν

word.kjv: And he hath put a new song in my mouth, even praise unto our God: many shall see it, and fear, and shall trust in the LORD.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงบรรจุเพลงใหม่ในปากข้าพเจ้า เป็นบทเพลงสรรเสริญพระเจ้าของเรา คนเป็นอันมากจะเห็นและเกรงกลัวและวางใจในพระเยโฮวาห์
word.spanish1909: Puso luego en mi boca canción nueva, alabanza á nuestro Dios. Verán esto muchos, y temerán, Y esperarán en Jehová.
word.latinvulgate: Dominus conservet eum, et vivificet eum, et beatum faciat eum in terra, et non tradat eum in animam inimicorum ejus.
word.italian1927: Egli ha messo nella mia bocca un nuovo cantico a lode del nostro Dio. Molti vedran questo e temeranno e confideranno nell’Eterno.
word.german1912: und hat mir ein neues Lied in meinen Mund gegeben, zu loben unsern Gott. Das werden viele sehen und den HERRN fürchten und auf ihn hoffen.
word.french1910: Il a mis dans ma bouche un cantique nouveau, Une louange à notre Dieu; Beaucoup l'ont vu, et ont eu de la crainte, Et ils se sont confiés en l'Eternel.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他使我口唱新歌，讚美我們的　神；許多人看見了，就必懼怕，並且要倚靠耶和華。
word.korean: 새 노래 곧 우리 하나님께 올릴 찬송을 내 입에 두셨으니 많은 사람이 보고 두려워하여 여호와를 의지하리로다
word.tagalog: At siya'y naglagay ng bagong awit sa aking bibig, sa makatuwid baga'y pagpuri sa aming Dios: marami ang mangakakakita at mangatatakot, at magsisitiwala sa Panginoon.
word.maori: A homai ana e ia he waiata hou ki toku mangai, he whakamoemiti ki to tatou Atua: he tokomaha e kite, a ka wehi ka whakawhirinaki ki a Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Ug nagbutang siya sa akong baba ug alawiton nga bag-o, bisan ang pagdayeg sa atong Dios: Makakita niini ang daghan, ug mangahadlok sila , Ug sila magasalig kang Jehova.
word.hebrew: ג  ויעלני מבור שאון--    מטיט היון ויקם על-סלע רגלי    כונן אשרי
word.hebrewmodern: ויתן בפי שיר חדש תהלה לאלהינו יראו רבים וייראו ויבטחו ביהוה׃
word.greekot: κύριος διαφυλάξαι αὐτὸν καὶ ζήσαι αὐτὸν καὶ μακαρίσαι αὐτὸν ἐν τῇ γῇ καὶ μὴ παραδῴη αὐτὸν εἰς χεῖρας ἐχθροῦ αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Therefore will not we fear, though the earth be removed, and though the mountains be carried into the midst of the sea;
word.thailand: ฉะนั้นเราจะไม่กลัว แม้ว่าแผ่นดินโลกจะถูกยกออกไป แม้ว่าภูเขาทั้งหลายจะโคลงเคลงลงสู่สะดือทะเล
word.spanish1909: Por tanto no temeremos aunque la tierra sea removida; Aunque se traspasen los montes al corazón de la mar.
word.latinvulgate: Omnes gentes, plaudite manibus ; jubilate Deo in voce exsultationis :
word.italian1927: Perciò noi non temeremo, anche quando fosse sconvolta la terra, quando i monti fossero smossi in seno ai mari,
word.german1912: Darum fürchten wir uns nicht, wenngleich die Welt unterginge und die Berge mitten ins Meer sänken,
word.french1910: C'est pourquoi nous sommes sans crainte quand la terre est bouleversée, Et que les montagnes chancellent au coeur des mers,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因此，地雖然震動，群山雖然崩塌入海洋的深處，我們也不害怕。
word.korean: 그러므로 땅이 변하든지 산이 흔들려 바다 가운데 빠지든지
word.tagalog: Kaya't hindi tayo matatakot bagaman ang lupa ay mabago, at bagaman ang mga bundok ay mangaglipat sa kagitnaan ng mga dagat;
word.maori: Na reira kore ake to tatou wehi, ahakoa nekehia te whenua, ahakoa kahakina nga maunga ki waenga moana;
word.cebuano: Busa dili kami mahadlok, bisan ang yuta pagaalid-an, Ug bisan ang mga bukid pagauyugon ngadto sa kahiladman sa kadagatan;
word.hebrew: ב  אלהים לנו מחסה ועז    עזרה בצרות נמצא מאד
word.hebrewmodern: על כן לא נירא בהמיר ארץ ובמוט הרים בלב ימים׃
word.greekot: πάντα τὰ ἔθνη κροτήσατε χεῖρας ἀλαλάξατε τῷ θεῷ ἐν φωνῇ ἀγαλλιάσεως

word.kjv: Wherefore should I fear in the days of evil, when the iniquity of my heels shall compass me about?
word.thailand: ทำไมข้าพเจ้าจึงกลัวในคราวทุกข์ยากลำบาก เมื่อความชั่วช้าแห่งผู้ข่มเหงล้อมตัวข้าพเจ้า
word.spanish1909: ¿Por qué he de temer en los días de adversidad, Cuando la iniquidad de mis insidiadores me cercare?
word.latinvulgate: Congregate illi sanctos ejus, qui ordinant testamentum ejus super sacrificia.
word.italian1927: Perché temerei ne’ giorni dell’avversità quando mi circonda l’iniquità dei miei insidiatori,
word.german1912: Warum sollte ich mich fürchten in bösen Tagen, wenn mich die Missetat meiner Untertreter umgibt,
word.french1910: Pourquoi craindrais-je aux jours du malheur, Lorsque l'iniquité de mes adversaires m'enveloppe?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 在患難的日子，暗中迫害我的惡人圍繞我的時候，我何須懼怕呢？
word.korean: 죄악이 나를 따라 에우는 환난의 날에 내가 어찌 두려워하랴
word.tagalog: Bakit ako matatakot sa mga kaarawan ng kasamaan, pagka kinukulong ako ng kasamaan sa aking mga sakong?
word.maori: Kia wehi ahau ki te aha i nga ra o te kino, ina karapotia ahau e te kino kei oku rekereke?
word.cebuano: Busa ngano nga mahadlok ako sa mga adlaw sa kadautan, Sa diha nga ang kasal-anan nga ania sa akong tikod magalibut kanako?
word.hebrew: ה  אטה למשל אזני    אפתח בכנור חידתי
word.hebrewmodern: למה אירא בימי רע עון עקבי יסובני׃
word.greekot: συναγάγετε αὐτῷ τοὺς ὁσίους αὐτοῦ τοὺς διατιθεμένους τὴν διαθήκην αὐτοῦ ἐπὶ θυσίαις

word.kjv: The righteous also shall see, and fear, and shall laugh at him:
word.thailand: คนชอบธรรมจะเห็นและเกรงกลัว และจะหัวเราะเยาะเขา กล่าวว่า
word.spanish1909: Y verán los justos, y temerán; Y reiránse de él, diciendo:
word.latinvulgate: Deum non invocaverunt ; illic trepidaverunt timore, ubi non erat timor. Quoniam Deus dissipavit ossa eorum qui hominibus placent : confusi sunt, quoniam Deus sprevit eos.
word.italian1927: I giusti lo vedranno e temeranno e si rideranno di quel tale, dicendo:
word.german1912: Und die Gerechten werden es sehen und sich fürchten und werden sein lachen:
word.french1910: Les justes le verront, et auront de la crainte, Et ils feront de lui le sujet de leurs moqueries:
word.chinesencvtraditional: 義人必看見而懼怕；他們必譏笑他，說：
word.korean: 의인이 보고 두려워하며 또 저를 비웃어 말하기를
word.tagalog: Makikita naman ng matuwid, at matatakot, at tatawa sa kaniya, na magsasabi,
word.maori: ¶ E kite hoki te hunga tika, a ka wehi; ka kata hoki ki a ia, ka mea,
word.cebuano: Ang matarung makakita usab niana , ug mahadlok, Ug mokatawa kaniya, nga maga-ingon :
word.hebrew: ו  אהבת כל-דברי-בלע    לשון מרמה
word.hebrewmodern: ויראו צדיקים וייראו ועליו ישחקו׃
word.greekot: ἐκεῖ φοβηθήσονται φόβον οὗ οὐκ ἦν φόβος ὅτι ὁ θεὸς διεσκόρπισεν ὀστᾶ ἀνθρωπαρέσκων κατῃσχύνθησαν ὅτι ὁ θεὸς ἐξουδένωσεν αὐτούς

word.kjv: There were they in great fear, where no fear was: for God hath scattered the bones of him that encampeth against thee: thou hast put them to shame, because God hath despised them.
word.thailand: เขาทั้งหลายอยู่ที่นั่นอย่างน่าสยดสยองยิ่งนัก ในที่ซึ่งไม่น่ามีความสยดสยอง เพราะพระเจ้าทรงกระจายกระดูกของคนที่ตั้งค่ายสู้เจ้า พระองค์ทรงให้เขาทั้งหลายได้อาย เพราะพระเจ้าทรงชังเขา
word.spanish1909: Allí se sobresaltaron de pavor donde no había miedo: Porque Dios ha esparcido los huesos del que asentó campo contra ti: Los avergonzaste, porque Dios los desechó.
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam alieni insurrexerunt adversum me, et fortes quæsierunt animam meam, et non proposuerunt Deum ante conspectum suum.
word.italian1927: Ecco là, son presi da grande spavento, ove prima non c’era spavento; poiché Dio ha disperse le ossa di quelli che ti assediavano; tu li hai coperti di confusione, perché Iddio li disdegna.
word.german1912: Da fürchten sie sich aber, wo nichts zu fürchten ist; denn Gott zerstreut die Gebeine derer, die dich belagern. Du machst sie zu Schanden; denn Gott verschmäht sie.
word.french1910: Alors ils trembleront d'épouvante, Sans qu'il y ait sujet d'épouvante; Dieu dispersera les os de ceux qui campent contre toi; Tu les confondras, car Dieu les a rejetés.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們在無可驚懼的時候，必大大震驚；因為　神把那些紮營攻擊你的人的骨頭擊散了；他們蒙羞受辱，因為　神棄絕了他們。
word.korean: 저희가 두려움이 없는 곳에서 크게 두려워하였으니 너를 대하여 진 친 저희의 뼈를 하나님이 흩으심이라 하나님이 저희를 버리신고로 네가 저희로 수치를 당케 하였도다
word.tagalog: Doo'y nangapasa malaking katakutan sila na hindi kinaroroonan ng takot: sapagka't pinangalat ng Dios ang mga buto niya na humahantong laban sa iyo; iyong inilagay sila sa kahihiyan, sapagka't itinakuwil sila ng Dios.
word.maori: Wehi noa iho ratou i reira, i te wahi kahore he wehi, no te mea kua titaria e te Atua nga wheua o te tangata i whakapaea ai koe: kua whakama ratou i a koe; no te mea kua whakahaweatia ratou e te Atua
word.cebuano: Didto sila sa mga dagkung kahadlok, diin walay kahadlokan; Kay ang Dios nagakatag sa mga bukog niya nga nagapahamutang batok kanimo: Ikaw nagapakaulaw kanila, tungod kay ang Dios nagasalikway kanila.
word.hebrew: ה  הלא ידעו פעלי-און    אכלי עמי אכלו לחם אלהים לא קראו
word.hebrewmodern: שם פחדו פחד לא היה פחד כי אלהים פזר עצמות חנך הבשתה כי אלהים מאסם׃
word.greekot: ὅτι ἀλλότριοι ἐπανέστησαν ἐπ' ἐμέ καὶ κραταιοὶ ἐζήτησαν τὴν ψυχήν μου οὐ προέθεντο τὸν θεὸν ἐνώπιον αὐτῶν διάψαλμα

word.kjv: God shall hear, and afflict them, even he that abideth of old. Selah. Because they have no changes, therefore they fear not God.
word.thailand: พระเจ้าจะทรงสดับและลดเขาลง คือพระองค์ผู้ทรงดำรงอยู่ตั้งแต่โบราณกาล เซลาห์ เพราะเขาไม่เปลี่ยน เขาจึงไม่ยำเกรงพระเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Dios oirá, y los quebrantará luego, El que desde la antigüedad permanece (Selah); Por cuanto no se mudan, Ni temen á Dios.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Iddio udirà e li umilierà, egli che siede sul trono ab antico; Sela. poiché in essi non v’è mutamento, e non temono Iddio.
word.german1912: Gott wird hören und sie demütigen, der allewege bleibt. (Sela.) Denn sie werden nicht anders und fürchten Gott nicht.
word.french1910: Dieu entendra, et il les humiliera, Lui qui de toute éternité est assis sur son trône; -Pause. Car il n'y a point en eux de changement, Et ils ne craignent point Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神必聽見，那從亙古坐著為王的必使他們受苦，（細拉）因他們不肯改變，也不敬畏　神。
word.korean: 태고부터 계신 하나님이 들으시고 (셀라) 변치 아니하며 하나님을 경외치 아니하는 자에게 보응하시리로다
word.tagalog: Didinggin ng Dios, at paghihigantihan sila, siyang tumatahan ng una. (Selah)
word.maori: Ka whakarongo te Atua, no tua iho nei tona nohoanga, a ka whakahoki i ta ratou. (Hera.) Ko te hunga kahore o ratou whakawhitiwhitinga, a kahore o ratou wehi ki te Atua.
word.cebuano: Ang Dios magapatalinghug, ug motubag kanila, Bisan pa siya nga nagapabilin sa kanhing panahon , (Selah) Ang mga tawo nga walay pagkabalhin, Ug wala usab mahadlok sa Dios.
word.hebrew: יט  פדה בשלום נפשי מקרב-לי    כי-ברבים היו עמדי
word.hebrewmodern: ישמע אל ויענם וישב קדם סלה אשר אין חליפות למו ולא יראו אלהים׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: In God I will praise his word, in God I have put my trust; I will not fear what flesh can do unto me.
word.thailand: ในพระเจ้า ข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระวจนะของพระองค์ ในพระเจ้า ข้าพระองค์วางใจอยู่ ข้าพระองค์จะไม่กลัวว่าเนื้อหนังอาจกระทำอะไรแก่ข้าพระองค์ได้
word.spanish1909: En Dios alabaré su palabra: En Dios he confiado, no temeré Lo que la carne me hiciere.
word.latinvulgate: Misit de cælo, et liberavit me ; dedit in opprobrium conculcantes me. Misit Deus misericordiam suam et veritatem suam,
word.italian1927: Coll’aiuto di Dio celebrerò la sua parola; in Dio confido, e non temerò; che mi può fare il mortale?
word.german1912: Ich will Gottes Namen rühmen; auf Gott will ich hoffen und mich nicht fürchten; was sollte mir Fleisch tun?
word.french1910: Je me glorifierai en Dieu, en sa parole; Je me confie en Dieu, je ne crains rien: Que peuvent me faire des hommes?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 靠著　神，我要讚美他的話；我倚靠　神，就必不懼怕，人能把我怎麼樣呢？
word.korean: 내가 하나님을 의지하고 그 말씀을 찬송하올지라 내가 하나님을 의지하였은즉 두려워 아니하리니 혈육있는 사람이 내게 어찌하리이까 ?
word.tagalog: Sa Dios (ay pupuri ako ng kaniyang salita), sa Dios ay inilagak ko ang aking tiwala, hindi ako matatakot; anong magagawa ng laman sa akin?
word.maori: Ma te Atua ahau ka whakamoemiti ki tana kupu: e whakawhirinaki ana ahau ki te Atua, e kore ahau e wehi. He aha ta te kikokiko e mea ai ki ahau?
word.cebuano: Sa Dios (magadayeg ako sa iyang pulong), Sa Dios gibutang ko ang akong pagsalig, dili ako mahadlok; Unsay mabuhat sa unod alang kanako?
word.hebrew: ד  יום אירא--    אני אליך אבטח
word.hebrewmodern: באלהים אהלל דברו באלהים בטחתי לא אירא מה יעשה בשר לי׃
word.greekot: ἐξαπέστειλεν ἐξ οὐρανοῦ καὶ ἔσωσέν με ἔδωκεν εἰς ὄνειδος τοὺς καταπατοῦντάς με διάψαλμα ἐξαπέστειλεν ὁ θεὸς τὸ ἔλεος αὐτοῦ καὶ τὴν ἀλήθειαν αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Thou hast given a banner to them that fear thee, that it may be displayed because of the truth. Selah.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงตั้งธงไว้ให้บรรดาผู้ที่เกรงกลัวพระองค์ เพื่อชักขึ้นเพราะเหตุความจริง เซลาห์
word.spanish1909: Has dado á los que te temen bandera Que alcen por la verdad. (Selah.)
word.latinvulgate: quia factus es spes mea, turris fortitudinis a facie inimici.
word.italian1927: Ma tu hai dato a quelli che ti temono una bandiera, perché si levino in favor della verità. Sela.
word.german1912: du hast aber doch ein Panier gegeben denen, die dich fürchten, welches sie aufwarfen und das sie sicher machte. (Sela.)
word.french1910: Tu as donné à ceux qui te craignent une bannière, Pour qu'elle s'élève à cause de la vérité. -Pause.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你為敬畏你的人，豎起旗幟，使他們可以逃到那裡，躲避敵人的弓箭（“使他們可以逃到那裡，躲避敵人的弓箭”或譯：“可以為真理揚起來”）。（細拉）
word.korean: 주를 경외하는 자에게 기를 주시고 진리를 위하여 달게 하셨나이다 (셀라)
word.tagalog: Nagbigay ka ng watawat sa nangatatakot sa iyo, upang maiwagayway dahil sa katotohanan. (Selah)
word.maori: Kua homai e koe he kara ki te hunga e wehi ana i a koe: kia whakakitea hei mea mo te pono. (Hera.
word.cebuano: Nagahatag ikaw ug bandila niadtong mga nangahadlok kanimo, Aron ilang pakayabon kini tungod sa kamatuoran. (Selah)
word.hebrew: ד  הרעשתה ארץ פצמתה    רפה שבריה כי-מטה
word.hebrewmodern: נתתה ליראיך נס להתנוסס מפני קשט סלה׃
word.greekot: ὡδήγησάς με ὅτι ἐγενήθης ἐλπίς μου πύργος ἰσχύος ἀπὸ προσώπου ἐχθροῦ

word.kjv: For thou, O God, hast heard my vows: thou hast given me the heritage of those that fear thy name.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า เพราะพระองค์ทรงสดับคำปฏิญาณของข้าพระองค์ และพระองค์ประทานมรดกของบรรดาผู้ที่เกรงกลัวพระนามของพระองค์แก่ข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Porque tú, oh Dios, has oído mis votos, Has dado heredad á los que temen tu nombre.
word.latinvulgate: Verumtamen pretium meum cogitaverunt repellere ; cucurri in siti ; ore suo benedicebant, et corde suo maledicebant.
word.italian1927: Poiché tu, o Dio, hai esaudito i miei voti, m’hai dato l’eredità di quelli che temono il tuo nome.
word.german1912: Denn du, Gott, hörst mein Gelübde; du belohnst die wohl, die deinen Namen fürchten.
word.french1910: Car toi, ô Dieu! tu exauces mes voeux, Tu me donnes l'héritage de ceux qui craignent ton nom.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神啊！你聽了我所許的願；你把產業賜給敬畏你名的人。
word.korean: 하나님이여, 내 서원을 들으시고 주의 이름을 경외하는 자의 얻을 기업을 내게 주셨나이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't dininig mo, Oh Dios, ang aking mga panata: ibinigay mo ang mana sa nangatatakot sa iyong pangalan.
word.maori: ¶ Kua rongo nei hoki koe, e te Atua, i aku kupu tauranga kua homai e koe te wahi o te hunga e wehi ana ki tou ingoa.
word.cebuano: Kay ikaw, Oh Dios, nakabati sa akong mga panaad: Ikaw naghatag kanako sa panulondon niadtong mga nahadlok sa imong ngalan.
word.hebrew: ה  אגורה באהלך עולמים    אחסה בסתר כנפיך סלה
word.hebrewmodern: כי אתה אלהים שמעת לנדרי נתת ירשת יראי שמך׃
word.greekot: πλὴν τὴν τιμήν μου ἐβουλεύσαντο ἀπώσασθαι ἔδραμον ἐν ψεύδει τῷ στόματι αὐτῶν εὐλογοῦσαν καὶ τῇ καρδίᾳ αὐτῶν κατηρῶντο διάψαλμα

word.kjv: Hear my voice, O God, in my prayer: preserve my life from fear of the enemy.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า ขอทรงสดับเสียงของข้าพระองค์เมื่อข้าพระองค์อธิษฐาน ขอทรงสงวนชีวิตของข้าพระองค์ไว้จากความคิดกลัวศัตรู
word.spanish1909: Al Músico principal: Salmo de David. ESCUCHA, oh Dios, mi voz en mi oración: Guarda mi vida del miedo del enemigo.
word.latinvulgate: In finem. Psalmus David, canticum Jeremiæ, et Ezechielis, populo transmigrationis, cum inciperent exire.
word.italian1927: Per il Capo de’ musici. Salmo di Davide. O Dio, ascolta la mia voce nel mio lamento! Guarda la mia vita dallo spavento del nemico.
word.german1912: Ein Psalm Davids, vorzusingen.  Höre, Gott, meine Stimme in meiner Klage; behüte mein Leben vor dem grausamen Feinde.
word.french1910: Au chef des chantres. Psaume de David. O Dieu, écoute ma voix, quand je gémis! Protège ma vie contre l'ennemi que je crains!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛的詩，交給詩班長。　神啊！我哀訴的時候，求你垂聽我的聲音；求你保護我的性命，脫離仇敵的恐嚇。
word.korean: (다윗의 시. 영장으로 한 노래) 하나님이여, 나의 근심하는 소리를 들으시고 원수의 두려움에서 나의 생명을 보존하소서
word.tagalog: Dinggin mo ang tinig ko, Oh Dios, sa aking hibik: ingatan mo ang buhay ko sa pagkatakot sa kaaway.
word.maori: ¶ Ki te tino kaiwhakatangi. He himene na Rawiri. Whakarongo ki toku reo, e te Atua, ina inoi atu ahau: tiakina toku ora i te wehi o te hoariri.
word.cebuano: Patalinghugi ang akong tingog, Oh Dios, sa akong pangamuyo: Bantayi ang akong kinabuhi gikan sa kahadlok sa kaaway.
word.hebrew: א  למנצח מזמור לדוד
word.hebrewmodern: למנצח מזמור לדוד שמע אלהים קולי בשיחי מפחד אויב תצר חיי׃
word.greekot: εἰς τὸ τέλος ψαλμὸς τῷ δαυιδ ᾠδή ιερεμιου καὶ ιεζεκιηλ ἐκ τοῦ λόγου τῆς παροικίας ὅτε ἔμελλον ἐκπορεύεσθαι

word.kjv: That they may shoot in secret at the perfect: suddenly do they shoot at him, and fear not.
word.thailand: ยิงออกมาจากที่ซุ่มยังคนปราศจากตำหนิ ยิงเขาทันทีและอย่างไม่กลัวเกรง
word.spanish1909: Para asaetear á escondidas al íntegro: De improviso lo asaetean, y no temen.
word.latinvulgate: Verba iniquorum prævaluerunt super nos, et impietatibus nostris tu propitiaberis.
word.italian1927: per colpire da luoghi nascosti l’uomo integro; lo colpiscono all’improvviso, e non hanno paura.
word.german1912: daß sie heimlich schießen die Frommen; plötzlich schießen sie auf ihn ohne alle Scheu.
word.french1910: Pour tirer en cachette sur l'innocent; Ils tirent sur lui à l'improviste, et n'ont aucune crainte.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要在暗地裡射殺完全的人；他們忽然射殺他，毫不懼怕。
word.korean: 숨은 곳에서 완전한 자를 쏘려 하다가 갑자기 쏘고 두려워하지 않도다
word.tagalog: Upang kanilang maihilagpos sa sakdal sa mga lihim na dako: biglang inihihilagpos nila sa kaniya at hindi natatakot.
word.maori: Hei koperenga pukutanga ma ratou ki te tangata tika; kitea rawatia ake kua kopere ki a ia, kahore hoki he wehi.
word.cebuano: Aron makapana sila sa mga hingpit diha sa awa-aw nga mga dapit: Sa kalit sila mopana kaniya, ug sila dili mahadlok.
word.hebrew: ד  אשר שננו כחרב לשונם    דרכו חצם דבר מר
word.hebrewmodern: לירות במסתרים תם פתאם ירהו ולא ייראו׃
word.greekot: λόγοι ἀνομιῶν ὑπερεδυνάμωσαν ἡμᾶς καὶ τὰς ἀσεβείας ἡμῶν σὺ ἱλάσῃ

word.kjv: And all men shall fear, and shall declare the work of God; for they shall wisely consider of his doing.
word.thailand: แล้วทุกคนจะกลัวเกรง เขาจะบอกถึงกิจการของพระเจ้า และตรึกตรองถึงสิ่งนั้นที่พระองค์ได้ทรงกระทำแล้ว
word.spanish1909: Y temerán todos los hombres, Y anunciarán la obra de Dios, Y entenderán su hecho.
word.latinvulgate: et timebunt qui habitant terminos a signis tuis ; exitus matutini et vespere delectabis.
word.italian1927: e tutti gli uomini temeranno, e racconteranno l’opera di Dio, e considereranno quello ch’egli avrà fatto.
word.german1912: Und alle Menschen werden sich fürchten und sagen: "Das hat Gott getan!" und merken, daß es sein Werk sei.
word.french1910: Tous les hommes sont saisis de crainte, Ils publient ce que Dieu fait, Et prennent garde à son oeuvre.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 眾人都要懼怕，要傳揚　神的作為，並且要思想他所作的事。
word.korean: 모든 사람이 두려워하여 하나님의 일을 선포하며 그 행하심을 깊이 생각하리로다
word.tagalog: At lahat ng mga tao ay mangatatakot; at kanilang ipahahayag ang salita ng Dios, at may karunungang kanilang bubuhayin ang kanilang gawa.
word.maori: Ka wehi ano hoki nga tangata katoa, ka whakapuaki i te mahi a te Atua: ka ata maharatia hoki e ratou tana mahi.
word.cebuano: Ug ang tanang mga tawo mangahadlok; Ug sila magamantala sa buhat sa Dios, Ug sa pagkamanggialamon magapalandong sila sa iyang buhat.
word.hebrew: ט  ויכשילוהו עלימו לשונם    יתנדדו כל-ראה בם
word.hebrewmodern: וייראו כל אדם ויגידו פעל אלהים ומעשהו השכילו׃
word.greekot: καὶ φοβηθήσονται οἱ κατοικοῦντες τὰ πέρατα ἀπὸ τῶν σημείων σου ἐξόδους πρωίας καὶ ἑσπέρας τέρψεις

word.kjv: Come and hear, all ye that fear God, and I will declare what he hath done for my soul.
word.thailand: บรรดาผู้ที่เกรงกลัวพระเจ้า ขอเชิญมาฟัง และข้าพเจ้าจะบอกถึงว่าพระองค์ได้ทรงกระทำอะไรแก่จิตวิญญาณข้าพเจ้าบ้าง
word.spanish1909: Venid, oid todos los que teméis á Dios, Y contaré lo que ha hecho á mi alma.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Venite e ascoltate, o voi tutti che temete Iddio! Io vi racconterò quel ch’egli ha fatto per l’anima mia.
word.german1912: Kommet her, höret zu alle, die ihr Gott fürchtet; ich will erzählen, was er an meiner Seele getan hat.
word.french1910: Venez, écoutez, vous tous qui craignez Dieu, et je raconterai Ce qu'il a fait à mon âme.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 所有敬畏　神的人哪！你們都要來聽，我要述說他為我所行的事。
word.korean: 하나님을 두려워하는 너희들아 다 와서 들으라 하나님이 내 영혼을 위하여 행하신 일을 내가 선포하리로다
word.tagalog: Kayo'y magsiparito at dinggin ninyo, ninyong lahat na nangatatakot sa Dios, at ipahahayag ko kung ano ang kaniyang ginawa sa aking kaluluwa.
word.maori: Haere mai, whakarongo, e koutou katoa e wehi ana ki te Atua, a maku e whakapuaki tana i mea ai ki toku wairua.
word.cebuano: Umari, ug patalinghug, ngatanan kamo nga nangahadlok sa Dios, Ug igapahayag ko kaninyo ang gibuhat niya alang sa akong kalag.
word.hebrew: טז  לכו-שמעו ואספרה כל-יראי אלהים    אשר עשה לנפשי
word.hebrewmodern: לכו שמעו ואספרה כל יראי אלהים אשר עשה לנפשי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: God shall bless us; and all the ends of the earth shall fear him.
word.thailand: พระเจ้าจะทรงอวยพระพรแก่เรา แล้วที่สุดปลายแผ่นดินโลกจะเกรงกลัวพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Bendíganos Dios, Y témanlo todos los fines de la tierra.
word.latinvulgate: Deus qui inhabitare facit unius moris in domo ; qui educit vinctos in fortitudine, similiter eos qui exasperant, qui habitant in sepulchris.
word.italian1927: Iddio ci benedirà, e tutte le estremità della terra lo temeranno.
word.german1912: Es segne uns Gott, und alle Welt fürchte ihn!
word.french1910: Dieu, nous bénit, Et toutes les extrémités de la terre le craignent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神要賜福給我們，全地都要敬畏他。
word.korean: 하나님이 우리에게 복을 주시리니 땅의 모든 끝이 하나님을 경외하리로다
word.tagalog: Pagpapalain kami ng Dios: at lahat ng mga wakas ng lupa ay mangatatakot sa kaniya.
word.maori: Ka manaaki te Atua i a tatou; a ka wehi nga pito katoa o te whenua i a ia.
word.cebuano: Ang Dios magapanalangin kanato; Ug ang tanang mga kinatumyan sa yuta mangahadlok kaniya.
word.hebrew: ז  ארץ נתנה יבולה    יברכנו אלהים אלהינו [ (Psalms 67:8) ח  יברכנו אלהים    וייראו אותו כל-אפסי-ארץ ]
word.hebrewmodern: יברכנו אלהים וייראו אתו כל אפסי ארץ׃
word.greekot: ὁ θεὸς κατοικίζει μονοτρόπους ἐν οἴκῳ ἐξάγων πεπεδημένους ἐν ἀνδρείᾳ ὁμοίως τοὺς παραπικραίνοντας τοὺς κατοικοῦντας ἐν τάφοις

word.kjv: They shall fear thee as long as the sun and moon endure, throughout all generations.
word.thailand: พวกเขาจะเกรงกลัวพระองค์ตราบที่ดวงอาทิตย์และดวงจันทร์คงอยู่ ตลอดทุกชั่วอายุ
word.spanish1909: Temerte han mientras duren el sol Y la luna, por generación de generaciones.
word.latinvulgate: In labore hominum non sunt, et cum hominibus non flagellabuntur.
word.italian1927: Ti temeranno fin che duri il sole, finché duri la luna, per ogni età!
word.german1912: Man wird dich fürchten, solange die Sonne und der Mond währt, von Kind zu Kindeskindern.
word.french1910: On te craindra, tant que subsistera le soleil, Tant que paraîtra la lune, de génération en génération.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他必像日月一般長久，直到萬代（本節按照《馬索拉抄本》應作“日月還在的時候，願人都敬畏你，直到萬代”；現參照《七十士譯本》翻譯）。
word.korean: 저희가 해가 있을 동안에 주를 두려워하며 달이 있을 동안에 대대로 그리하리로다
word.tagalog: Sila'y mangatatakot sa iyo habang nananatili ang araw, at habang sumisilang ang buwan, sa lahat ng sali't saling lahi.
word.maori: I te ra e mau ana, i te marama hoki, ka pera te mau o to ratou wehi ki a koe i nga whakatupuranga katoa.
word.cebuano: Mangahadlok sila kanimo samtang nagalungtad pa ang adlaw, Ug samtang usab ang bulan nagapadayon sa tanang mga kaliwatan.
word.hebrew: ה  ייראוך עם-שמש    ולפני ירח דור דורים
word.hebrewmodern: ייראוך עם שמש ולפני ירח דור דורים׃
word.greekot: ἐν κόποις ἀνθρώπων οὐκ εἰσὶν καὶ μετὰ ἀνθρώπων οὐ μαστιγωθήσονται

word.kjv: Thou, even thou, art to be feared: and who may stand in thy sight when once thou art angry?
word.thailand: แต่พระองค์เจ้า พระองค์ทรงเป็นที่น่าคร้ามกลัว เมื่อพระองค์ทรงกริ้วขึ้นแล้วใครจะยืนอยู่ในสายพระเนตรของพระองค์ได้
word.spanish1909: Tú, terrible eres tú: ¿Y quién parará delante de ti, en comenzando tu ira?
word.latinvulgate: Et meditatus sum nocte cum corde meo, et exercitabar, et scopebam spiritum meum.
word.italian1927: Tu, tu sei tremendo; e chi può reggere davanti a te quando t’adiri?
word.german1912: Du bist erschrecklich. Wer kann vor dir stehen, wenn du zürnest?
word.french1910: Tu es redoutable, ô toi! Qui peut te résister, quand ta colère éclate?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 唯有你是可畏的，你的烈怒一發出，誰能在你面前站立得住呢？
word.korean: 주 곧 주는 경외할 자시니 주께서 한번 노하실 때에 누가 주의 목전에 서리이까
word.tagalog: Ikaw, ikaw ay katatakutan: at sinong makatatayo sa iyong paningin, sa minsang ikaw ay magalit?
word.maori: ¶ Ko koe, ina, ko koe e wehingia; ko wai hoki e tu ki tou aroaro ina riri koe?
word.cebuano: Ikaw, bisan ikaw gayud, ang angay pagakahadlokan; Ug kinsa man ang makabarug sa imong pagtan-aw sa diha nga sa makausa ikaw masuko?
word.hebrew: ז  מגערתך אלהי יעקב    נרדם ורכב וסוס
word.hebrewmodern: אתה נורא אתה ומי יעמד לפניך מאז אפך׃
word.greekot: νυκτὸς μετὰ τῆς καρδίας μου ἠδολέσχουν καὶ ἔσκαλλεν τὸ πνεῦμά μου

word.kjv: Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven; the earth feared, and was still,
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงลั่นคำพิพากษามาจากฟ้าสวรรค์ แผ่นดินโลกก็กลัวและนิ่งเงียบ
word.spanish1909: Desde los cielos hiciste oir juicio; La tierra tuvo temor y quedó suspensa,
word.latinvulgate: Numquid in æternum projiciet Deus ? aut non apponet ut complacitior sit adhuc ?
word.italian1927: Dal cielo facesti udir la tua sentenza; la terra temette e tacque,
word.german1912: Wenn du das Urteil lässest hören vom Himmel, so erschrickt das Erdreich und wird still,
word.french1910: Du haut des cieux tu as proclamé la sentence; La terre effrayée s'est tenue tranquille,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神啊！你起來施行審判，要拯救地上所有困苦的人。那時，你從天上宣告審判，地上的人就懼怕，並且靜默無聲。（細拉）
word.korean: 주께서 하늘에서 판결을 선포하시매 땅이 두려워 잠잠하였나니
word.tagalog: Iyong ipinarinig ang hatol mula sa langit; ang lupa ay natakot, at tumahimik,
word.maori: Nau i rangona iho ai te whakawa i te rangi: wehi ana te whenua, whakaririka kau ana,
word.cebuano: Gikan sa langit gipadungog mo ang paghukom; Ang yuta nahadlok, ug mihilum,
word.hebrew: ח  אתה נורא אתה--ומי-יעמד לפניך    מאז אפך
word.hebrewmodern: משמים השמעת דין ארץ יראה ושקטה׃
word.greekot: μὴ εἰς τοὺς αἰῶνας ἀπώσεται κύριος καὶ οὐ προσθήσει τοῦ εὐδοκῆσαι ἔτι

word.kjv: Vow, and pay unto the LORD your God: let all that be round about him bring presents unto him that ought to be feared.
word.thailand: จงปฏิญาณต่อพระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของท่านทั้งหลาย และจงปฏิบัติตาม ให้คนที่อยู่รอบพระองค์นำของกำนัลมายังพระองค์ผู้ซึ่งเขาควรเกรงกลัว
word.spanish1909: Prometed, y pagad á Jehová vuestro Dios: Todos los que están alrededor de él, traigan presentes al Terrible.
word.latinvulgate: Et dixi : Nunc cœpi ; hæc mutatio dexteræ Excelsi.
word.italian1927: Fate voti all’Eterno, all’Iddio vostro, e adempiteli; tutti quelli che gli stanno attorno portin doni al Tremendo.
word.german1912: Gelobet und haltet dem HERRN, eurem Gott; alle, die ihr um ihn her seid, bringet Geschenke dem Schrecklichen,
word.french1910: Faites des voeux à l'Eternel, votre Dieu, et accomplissez-les! Que tous ceux qui l'environnent apportent des dons au Dieu terrible!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們許願，總要向耶和華你們的　神償還；所有在他周圍的人，都要把貢物帶來獻給那可敬畏的　神。
word.korean: 너희는 여호와 너희 하나님께 서원하고 갚으라 사방에 있는 모든 자도 마땅히 경외할 이에게 예물을 드릴지로다
word.tagalog: Manata ka at tuparin mo sa Panginoon mong Dios: magdala ng mga kaloob sa kaniya na marapat katakutan, yaong lahat na nangasa buong palibot niya.
word.maori: Whakapuakina te kupu taurangi ki a Ihowa, ki to koutou Atua, whakamana hoki; e te hunga katoa i tetahi taha ona, i tetahi taha, mauria he hakari ki a ia, ka tika hoki te wehi ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Manaad, ug mamayad kamo kang Jehova nga inyong Dios: Padad-a ug mga gasa kadtong tanan nga nanaglibut ngadto kaniya nga takus pagakahadlokan.
word.hebrew: יא  כי-חמת אדם תודך    שארית חמת תחגר
word.hebrewmodern: נדרו ושלמו ליהוה אלהיכם כל סביביו יובילו שי למורא׃
word.greekot: καὶ εἶπα νῦν ἠρξάμην αὕτη ἡ ἀλλοίωσις τῆς δεξιᾶς τοῦ ὑψίστου

word.kjv: And he led them on safely, so that they feared not: but the sea overwhelmed their enemies.
word.thailand: พระองค์นำเขาไปอย่างปลอดภัย เขาจึงไม่กลัว แต่ทะเลท่วมศัตรูของเขา
word.spanish1909: Y guiólos con seguridad, que no tuvieron miedo; Y la mar cubrió á sus enemigos.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Lo guidò sicuramente sì che non ebbero da spaventarsi, mentre il mare inghiottiva i loro nemici.
word.german1912: Und leitete sie sicher, daß sie sich nicht fürchteten; aber ihre Feinde bedeckte das Meer.
word.french1910: Il les dirigea sûrement, pour qu'ils fussent sans crainte, Et la mer couvrit leurs ennemis.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他帶領他們平平安安地走過去，所以他們不懼怕；海卻淹沒了他們的仇敵。
word.korean: 저희를 안전히 인도하시니 저희는 두려움이 없었으나 저희 원수는 바다에 엄몰되었도다
word.tagalog: At inihatid niya silang tiwasay, na anopa't hindi sila nangatakot: nguni't tinakpan ng dagat ang kanilang mga kaaway.
word.maori: Na ka arahina marietia ratou e ia, te wehi ratou: ko o ratou hoariri ia taupokina iho e te moana.
word.cebuano: Ug iyang gimandoan sila nga walay kabilinggan, sa pagkaagi nga sila wala mangahadlok; Apan ang dagat milumos sa ilang mga kaaway.
word.hebrew: נג  וינחם לבטח ולא פחדו    ואת-אויביהם כסה הים
word.hebrewmodern: וינחם לבטח ולא פחדו ואת אויביהם כסה הים׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Surely his salvation is nigh them that fear him; that glory may dwell in our land.
word.thailand: แน่ทีเดียวที่ความรอดของพระองค์อยู่ใกล้คนที่เกรงกลัวพระองค์ เพื่อสง่าราศีจะอยู่ในแผ่นดินของข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลาย
word.spanish1909: Ciertamente cercana está su salud á los que le temen; Para que habite la gloria en nuestra tierra.
word.latinvulgate: Omnes gentes quascumque fecisti venient, et adorabunt coram te, Domine, et glorificabunt nomen tuum.
word.italian1927: Certo, la sua salvezza è vicina a quelli che lo temono, affinché la gloria abiti nel nostro paese.
word.german1912: Doch ist ja seine Hilfe nahe denen, die ihn fürchten, daß in unserm Lande Ehre wohne;
word.french1910: Oui, son salut est près de ceux qui le craignent, Afin que la gloire habite dans notre pays.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他的救恩的確臨近敬畏他的人，使他的榮耀住在我們的地上。
word.korean: 진실로 그의 구원이 그를 경외하는 자에게 가까우니 이에 영광이 우리 땅에 거하리이다
word.tagalog: Tunay na ang kaniyang pagliligtas ay malapit sa kanila na nangatatakot sa kaniya; upang ang kaluwalhatian ay tumahan sa aming lupain.
word.maori: Ina, he tata tonu tana whakaoranga ki te hunga e wehi ana ki a ia, kia noho ai te kororia ki to tatou whenua.
word.cebuano: Sa pagkamatuod gayud haduol ang iyang kaluwasan kanila nga adunay kahadlok kaniya, Aron magapabilin ang himaya dinhi sa atong yuta.
word.hebrew: ט  אשמעה--    מה-ידבר האל יהוה כי ידבר שלום--אל-עמו ואל-חסידיו    ואל-ישובו לכסלה
word.hebrewmodern: אך קרוב ליראיו ישעו לשכן כבוד בארצנו׃
word.greekot: πάντα τὰ ἔθνη ὅσα ἐποίησας ἥξουσιν καὶ προσκυνήσουσιν ἐνώπιόν σου κύριε καὶ δοξάσουσιν τὸ ὄνομά σου

word.kjv: Teach me thy way, O LORD; I will walk in thy truth: unite my heart to fear thy name.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอทรงสอนพระมรรคาของพระองค์แก่ข้าพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์จะดำเนินในความจริงของพระองค์ ขอทรงสำรวมใจของข้าพระองค์ให้ยำเกรงพระนามของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Enséñame, oh Jehová, tu camino; caminaré yo en tu verdad: Consolida mi corazón para que tema tu nombre.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: O Eterno, insegnami la tua via; io camminerò nella tua verità; unisci il mio cuore al timor del tuo nome.
word.german1912: Weise mir, HERR, deinen Weg, daß ich wandle in deiner Wahrheit; erhalte mein Herz bei dem einen, daß ich deinen Namen fürchte.
word.french1910: Enseigne-moi tes voies, ô Eternel! Je marcherai dans ta fidélité. Dispose mon coeur à la crainte de ton nom.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！求你把你的道路指教我，使我行在你的真理中，專心敬畏你的名。
word.korean: 여호와여, 주의 도로 내게 가르치소서 내가 주의 진리에 행하오리니 일심으로 주의 이름을 경외하게 하소서
word.tagalog: Ituro mo sa akin ang iyong daan, Oh Panginoon; lalakad ako sa iyong katotohanan: ilakip mo ang aking puso sa pagkatakot sa iyong pangalan.
word.maori: Whakaakona ahau ki tau ara, e Ihowa; ka haere ahau i runga i tou pono: whakatapatahitia toku ngakau ki te wehi i tou ingoa.
word.cebuano: Tudloi ako sa imong dalan, Oh Jehova; ako magalakaw sa imong kamatuoran: Bug-osa ang akong kasingkasing sa pagkahadlok sa imong ngalan.
word.hebrew: יא  הורני יהוה דרכך--    אהלך באמתך יחד לבבי    ליראה שמך
word.hebrewmodern: הורני יהוה דרכך אהלך באמתך יחד לבבי ליראה שמך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: God is greatly to be feared in the assembly of the saints, and to be had in reverence of all them that are about him.
word.thailand: คือองค์พระเจ้าผู้เป็นที่เกรงกลัวอย่างยิ่งในสภาของบรรดาวิสุทธิชน และบรรดาผู้ที่อยู่รอบพระองค์เกรงขามพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Dios terrible en la grande congregación de los santos, Y formidable sobre todos cuantos están alrededor suyo.
word.latinvulgate: Quia defecimus in ira tua, et in furore tuo turbati sumus.
word.italian1927: Iddio è molto terribile nell’assemblea dei santi, e più tremendo di tutti quelli che l’attorniano.
word.german1912: Gott ist sehr mächtig in der Versammlung der Heiligen und wunderbar über alle, die um ihn sind.
word.french1910: Dieu est terrible dans la grande assemblée des saints, Il est redoutable pour tous ceux qui l'entourent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 在聖者的議會中，　神是令人驚懼的，比一切在他周圍的都更為可畏。
word.korean: 하나님은 거룩한 자의 회중에서 심히 엄위하시오며 둘러 있는 모든 자 위에 더욱 두려워할 자시니이다
word.tagalog: Isang Dios na kakilakilabot sa kapulungan ng mga banal, at kinatatakutan ng higit sa lahat na nangasa palibot niya?
word.maori: He Atua whakamataku rawa i roto i te whakaminenga o te hunga tapu, e wehingia ana i runga ake i a ratou katoa i tetahi taha, i tetahi taha ona?
word.cebuano: Dios nga hilabihan pagkamakali-lisang sa katilingban sa mga balaan, Ug takus kahadlokan ibabaw niadtong tanan nga nanaglibut kaniya?
word.hebrew: ז  כי מי בשחק יערך ליהוה    ידמה ליהוה בבני אלים
word.hebrewmodern: אל נערץ בסוד קדשים רבה ונורא על כל סביביו׃
word.greekot: ὅτι ἐξελίπομεν ἐν τῇ ὀργῇ σου καὶ ἐν τῷ θυμῷ σου ἐταράχθημεν

word.kjv: Who knoweth the power of thine anger? even according to thy fear, so is thy wrath.
word.thailand: ผู้ใดจะทราบถึงฤทธิ์ความกริ้วของพระองค์ และพระพิโรธของพระองค์ตามความเกรงกลัวพระองค์
word.spanish1909: ¿Quién conoce la fortaleza de tu ira, Y tu indignación según que debes ser temido?
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam angelis suis mandavit de te, ut custodiant te in omnibus viis tuis.
word.italian1927: Chi conosce la forza della tua ira e il tuo cruccio secondo il timore che t’è dovuto?
word.german1912: Wer glaubt aber, daß du so sehr zürnest, und wer fürchtet sich vor solchem deinem Grimm?
word.french1910: Qui prend garde à la force de ta colère, Et à ton courroux, selon la crainte qui t'est due?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 誰曉得你怒氣的威力，誰按著你該受的敬畏曉得你的忿怒呢？
word.korean: 누가 주의 노의 능력을 알며 누가 주를 두려워하여야 할대로 주의 진노를 알리이까
word.tagalog: Sinong nakakaalam ng kapangyarihan ng iyong galit, at ng iyong poot ayon sa katakutan na marapat sa iyo?
word.maori: Ko wai te matau ana ki te kaha o tou riri? Rite pu ki te wehi ki a koe tou riri.
word.cebuano: Kinsa ba ang makaila sa gahum sa imong kasuko, Ug sa imong kaligutgut sumala sa kahadlok nga angay kanimo?
word.hebrew: יא  מי-יודע עז אפך    וכיראתך עברתך
word.hebrewmodern: מי יודע עז אפך וכיראתך עברתך׃
word.greekot: ὅτι τοῖς ἀγγέλοις αὐτοῦ ἐντελεῖται περὶ σοῦ τοῦ διαφυλάξαι σε ἐν πάσαις ταῖς ὁδοῖς σου

word.kjv: For the LORD is great, and greatly to be praised: he is to be feared above all gods.
word.thailand: เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์นั้นทรงยิ่งใหญ่และสมควรจะสรรเสริญอย่างยิ่ง พระองค์ทรงเป็นที่เกรงกลัวเหนือพระทั้งปวง
word.spanish1909: Porque grande es Jehová, y digno de suprema alabanza; Terrible sobre todos los dioses.
word.latinvulgate: Illuxerunt fulgura ejus orbi terræ ; vidit, et commota est terra.
word.italian1927: Perché l’Eterno è grande e degno di sovrana lode; egli è tremendo sopra tutti gli dèi.
word.german1912: Denn der HERR ist groß und hoch zu loben, wunderbar über alle Götter.
word.french1910: Car l'Eternel est grand et très digne de louange, Il est redoutable par-dessus tous les dieux;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為耶和華是偉大的，該受極大的讚美，他當受敬畏，過於眾神之上。
word.korean: 여호와는 광대하시니 극진히 찬양할 것이요 모든 신보다 경외할 것임이여
word.tagalog: Sapagka't dakila ang Panginoon, at marapat na purihin: siya'y kinatatakutang higit kay sa lahat na dios.
word.maori: He nui hoki a Ihowa, he tika ano kia nui te whakamoemiti ki a ia: kia wehingia nuitia ai i nga atua katoa.
word.cebuano: Kay daku si Jehova, ug takus sa labing daku nga pagdayeg: Siya takus pagakahadlokan ibabaw sa tanang mga dios.
word.hebrew: ד  כי גדול יהוה ומהלל מאד    נורא הוא על-כל-אלהים
word.hebrewmodern: כי גדול יהוה ומהלל מאד נורא הוא על כל אלהים׃
word.greekot: ἔφαναν αἱ ἀστραπαὶ αὐτοῦ τῇ οἰκουμένῃ εἶδεν καὶ ἐσαλεύθη ἡ γῆ

word.kjv: O worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness: fear before him, all the earth.
word.thailand: จงนมัสการพระเยโฮวาห์ด้วยเครื่องประดับแห่งความบริสุทธิ์ ชาวโลกทั้งสิ้นเอ๋ย จงตัวสั่นต่อเบื้องพระพักตร์พระองค์
word.spanish1909: Encorvaos á Jehová en la hermosura de su santuario: Temed delante de él, toda la tierra.
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam tu Dominus altissimus super omnem terram ; nimis exaltatus es super omnes deos.
word.italian1927: Prostratevi dinanzi all’Eterno vestiti di sacri ornamenti, tremate dinanzi a lui, o abitanti di tutta la terra!
word.german1912: Betet an den HERRN in heiligem Schmuck; es fürchte ihn alle Welt!
word.french1910: Prosternez-vous devant l'Eternel avec des ornements sacrés. Tremblez devant lui, vous tous, habitants de la terre!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要以聖潔的裝束敬拜耶和華（“要以聖潔的裝束敬拜耶和華”或譯：“在耶和華顯現的時候，要敬拜他”，或“要在耶和華聖潔的光輝中敬拜他”），全地都要在他面前戰慄。
word.korean: 아름답고 거룩한 것으로 여호와께 경배할지어다 ! 온 땅이여, 그 앞에서 떨지어다
word.tagalog: Oh sambahin ninyo ang Panginoon sa kagandahan ng kabanalan: manginig kayo sa harap niya, buong lupa.
word.maori: Koropiko ki a Ihowa i roto i te ataahua o te tapu: kia wehi ra ki tona aroaro, e te whenua katoa.
word.cebuano: Oh managsimba kamo kang Jehova sa katahum sa pagkabalaan: Managkurog sa atubangan niya, tibook nga yuta.
word.hebrew: ט  השתחוו ליהוה בהדרת-קדש    חילו מפניו כל-הארץ
word.hebrewmodern: השתחוו ליהוה בהדרת קדש חילו מפניו כל הארץ׃
word.greekot: ὅτι σὺ εἶ κύριος ὁ ὕψιστος ἐπὶ πᾶσαν τὴν γῆν σφόδρα ὑπερυψώθης ὑπὲρ πάντας τοὺς θεούς

word.kjv: So the heathen shall fear the name of the LORD, and all the kings of the earth thy glory.
word.thailand: บรรดาประชาชาติจะกลัวพระนามของพระเยโฮวาห์ และบรรดากษัตริย์ของแผ่นดินโลกกลัวสง่าราศีของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Entonces temerán las gentes el nombre de Jehová, Y todos los reyes de la tierra tu gloria;
word.latinvulgate: Homo, sicut fœnum dies ejus ; tamquam flos agri, sic efflorebit :
word.italian1927: Allora le nazioni temeranno il nome dell’Eterno, e tutti i re della terra la tua gloria,
word.german1912: daß die Heiden den Namen des HERRN fürchten und alle Könige auf Erden dein Ehre,
word.french1910: Alors les nations craindront le nom de l'Eternel, Et tous les rois de la terre ta gloire.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 萬國都必敬畏耶和華的名；世上列王都敬畏你的榮耀。
word.korean: 이에 열방이 여호와의 이름을 경외하며 세계 열왕이 주의 영광을 경외하리니
word.tagalog: Sa gayo'y katatakutan ng mga bansa ang pangalan ng Panginoon. At ng lahat ng hari sa lupa ang iyong kaluwalhatian;
word.maori: Penei ka wehingia te ingoa o Ihowa e nga tauiwi, tou kororia hoki e nga kingi katoa o te whenua.
word.cebuano: Busa mahadlok ang mga nasud sa ngalan ni Jehova, Ug ang tanang mga hari sa yuta mangurog sa imong himaya.
word.hebrew: טו  כי-רצו עבדיך את-אבניה    ואת-עפרה יחננו
word.hebrewmodern: וייראו גוים את שם יהוה וכל מלכי הארץ את כבודך׃
word.greekot: ἄνθρωπος ὡσεὶ χόρτος αἱ ἡμέραι αὐτοῦ ὡσεὶ ἄνθος τοῦ ἀγροῦ οὕτως ἐξανθήσει

word.kjv: For as the heaven is high above the earth, so great is his mercy toward them that fear him.
word.thailand: เพราะว่าฟ้าสวรรค์สูงเหนือแผ่นดินเท่าใด ความเมตตาของพระองค์ที่มีต่อบรรดาคนที่เกรงกลัวพระองค์ก็ใหญ่ยิ่งเท่านั้น
word.spanish1909: Porque como la altura de los cielos sobre la tierra, Engrandeció su misericordia sobre los que le temen.
word.latinvulgate: Potabunt omnes bestiæ agri ; expectabunt onagri in siti sua.
word.italian1927: Poiché quanto i cieli sono alti al disopra della terra, tanto è grande la sua benignità verso quelli che lo temono.
word.german1912: Denn so hoch der Himmel über der Erde ist, läßt er seine Gnade walten über die, so ihn fürchten.
word.french1910: Mais autant les cieux sont élevés au-dessus de la terre, Autant sa bonté est grande pour ceux qui le craignent;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 天離地有多高，他的慈愛向敬畏他的人也有多大。
word.korean: 이는 하늘이 땅에서 높음 같이 그를 경외하는 자에게 그 인자하심이 크심이로다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't kung paanong ang mga langit ay mataas kay sa lupa, gayon kalaki ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob sa kanila na nangatatakot sa kaniya.
word.maori: He rite hoki ki te rangi e tiketike ake ana i te whenua, pera tonu te nui o tana mahi tohu ki te hunga e wehi ana ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Kay ingon nga ang mga langit hataas ibabaw sa yuta, Ingon man kadaku ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot ngadto kanila nga may kahadlok kaniya.
word.hebrew: יא  כי כגבה שמים על-הארץ--    גבר חסדו על-יראיו
word.hebrewmodern: כי כגבה שמים על הארץ גבר חסדו על יראיו׃
word.greekot: ποτιοῦσιν πάντα τὰ θηρία τοῦ ἀγροῦ προσδέξονται ὄναγροι εἰς δίψαν αὐτῶν

word.kjv: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the LORD pitieth them that fear him.
word.thailand: บิดาสงสารบุตรของตนฉันใด พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงสงสารบรรดาคนที่ยำเกรงพระองค์ฉันนั้น
word.spanish1909: Como el padre se compadece de los hijos, Se compadece Jehová de los que le temen.
word.latinvulgate: Rigans montes de superioribus suis ; de fructu operum tuorum satiabitur terra ;
word.italian1927: Come un padre è pietoso verso i suoi figliuoli, così è pietoso l’Eterno verso quelli che lo temono.
word.german1912: Wie sich ein Vater über Kinder erbarmt, so erbarmt sich der HERR über die, so ihn fürchten.
word.french1910: Comme un père a compassion de ses enfants, L'Eternel a compassion de ceux qui le craignent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 父親怎樣憐恤兒子，耶和華也照樣憐恤敬畏他的人；
word.korean: 아비가 자식을 불쌍히 여김 같이 여호와께서 자기를 경외하는 자를 불쌍히 여기시나니
word.tagalog: Kung paanong ang ama ay naaawa sa kaniyang mga anak, gayon naaawa ang Panginoon sa kanilang nangatatakot sa kaniya.
word.maori: E aroha ana te matua ki ana tamariki, pera tonu to Ihowa aroha ki te hunga e wehi ana ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Sama sa usa ka amahan nga nalooy sa iyang mga anak, Sa mao nga pagkaagi nalooy si Jehova kanila nga may kahadlok kaniya.
word.hebrew: יג  כרחם אב על-בנים--    רחם יהוה על-יראיו
word.hebrewmodern: כרחם אב על בנים רחם יהוה על יראיו׃
word.greekot: ποτίζων ὄρη ἐκ τῶν ὑπερῴων αὐτοῦ ἀπὸ καρποῦ τῶν ἔργων σου χορτασθήσεται ἡ γῆ

word.kjv: But the mercy of the LORD is from everlasting to everlasting upon them that fear him, and his righteousness unto children's children;
word.thailand: แต่ความเมตตาของพระเยโฮวาห์นั้นดำรงอยู่ตั้งแต่นิรันดร์กาลถึงนิรันดร์กาลต่อผู้ที่ยำเกรงพระองค์ และความชอบธรรมของพระองค์ต่อหลานเหลน
word.spanish1909: Mas la misericordia de Jehová desde el siglo y hasta el siglo sobre los que le temen, Y su justicia sobre los hijos de los hijos;
word.latinvulgate: illic passeres nidificabunt, herodii domus dux est eorum ;
word.italian1927: Ma la benignità dell’Eterno dura ab eterno e in eterno, sopra quelli che lo temono, e la sua giustizia sopra i figliuoli de’ figliuoli
word.german1912: Die Gnade aber des HERRN währet von Ewigkeit zu Ewigkeit über die, so ihn fürchten, und seine Gerechtigkeit auf Kindeskind
word.french1910: Mais la bonté de l'Eternel dure à jamais pour ceux qui le craignent, Et sa miséricorde pour les enfants de leurs enfants,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 但從亙古到永遠，耶和華的慈愛臨到敬畏他的人；他的公義也歸於他們的子子孫孫，
word.korean: 여호와의 인자하심은 자기를 경외하는 자에게 영원부터 영원까지 이르며 그의 의는 자손의 자손에게 미치리니
word.tagalog: Nguni't ang kagandahang-loob ng Panginoon ay mula ng walang pasimula hanggang sa walang hanggan sa nangatatakot sa kaniya, at ang kaniyang katuwiran ay hanggang sa mga anak ng mga anak;
word.maori: Tena ko te mahi tohu a Ihowa no tua whakarere, a ake tonu ake, ki te hunga e wehi ana ki a ia: tona tika hoki ki nga uri o nga tamariki;
word.cebuano: Apan ang mahigugmaong-kalolot ni Jehova nagagikan sa walay katapusan ngadto sa walay katapusan ibabaw kanila nga may kahadlok kaniya, Ug ang iyang pagkamatarung ngadto sa mga anak sa mga anak;
word.hebrew: יז  וחסד יהוה מעולם ועד-עולם--    על-יראיו וצדקתו    לבני בנים
word.hebrewmodern: וחסד יהוה מעולם ועד עולם על יראיו וצדקתו לבני בנים׃
word.greekot: ἐκεῖ στρουθία ἐννοσσεύσουσιν τοῦ ἐρωδιοῦ ἡ οἰκία ἡγεῖται αὐτῶν

word.kjv: Egypt was glad when they departed: for the fear of them fell upon them.
word.thailand: เมื่อเขาพรากจากไป อียิปต์ก็ยินดี เพราะความครั่นคร้ามต่ออิสราเอลได้ตกอยู่บนเขา
word.spanish1909: Egipto se alegró de que salieran; Porque su terror había caído sobre ellos.
word.latinvulgate: Et effuderunt sanguinem innocentem, sanguinem filiorum suorum et filiarum suarum, quas sacrificaverunt sculptilibus Chanaan. Et infecta est terra in sanguinibus ;
word.italian1927: L’Egitto si rallegrò della loro partenza, poiché la paura d’essi era caduta su loro.
word.german1912: gypten ward froh, daß sie auszogen; denn ihre Furcht war auf sie gefallen.
word.french1910: Les Egyptiens se réjouirent de leur départ, Car la terreur qu'ils avaient d'eux les saisissait.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們出來的時候，埃及人很歡喜，因為埃及人都懼怕他們。
word.korean: 그들의 떠날 때에 애굽이 기뻐하였으니 저희가 그들을 두려워함이로다
word.tagalog: Natuwa ang Egipto nang sila'y magsialis; sapagka't ang takot sa kanila ay nahulog sa kanila.
word.maori: Na hari ana a Ihipa i to ratou haerenga; i mau hoki to ratou wehi ki a ratou.
word.cebuano: Nalipay ang Egipto sa ilang pagpamahawa; Kay ang kahadlok kanila miabut sa ibabaw nila.
word.hebrew: לח  שמח מצרים בצאתם    כי-נפל פחדם עליהם
word.hebrewmodern: שמח מצרים בצאתם כי נפל פחדם עליהם׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐξέχεαν αἷμα ἀθῷον αἷμα υἱῶν αὐτῶν καὶ θυγατέρων ὧν ἔθυσαν τοῖς γλυπτοῖς χανααν καὶ ἐφονοκτονήθη ἡ γῆ ἐν τοῖς αἵμασιν

word.kjv: He hath given meat unto them that fear him: he will ever be mindful of his covenant.
word.thailand: พระองค์ประทานอาหารให้ผู้ที่เกรงกลัวพระองค์ พระองค์จะทรงจดจำพันธสัญญาของพระองค์เสมอ
word.spanish1909: Dió mantenimiento á los que le temen; Para siempre se acordará de su pacto.
word.latinvulgate: Jucundus homo qui miseretur et commodat, disponet sermones suos in judicio ;
word.italian1927: Egli ha dato da vivere a quelli che lo temono, egli si ricorda in eterno del suo patto.
word.german1912: Er gibt Speise denen, die ihn fürchten; er gedenkt ewiglich an seinen Bund.
word.french1910: Il a donné de la nourriture à ceux qui le craignent; Il se souvient toujours de son alliance.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他賜糧食給敬畏他的人；他永遠記念自己的約。
word.korean: 여호와께서 자기를 경외하는 자에게 양식을 주시며 그 언약을 영원히 기억하시리로다
word.tagalog: Siya'y nagbigay ng pagkain sa nangatatakot sa kaniya: kaniyang aalalahaning lagi ang kaniyang tipan.
word.maori: E homai ana e ia he kai ma te hunga e wehi ana ki a ia: ka mahara tonu ia ki tana kawenata.
word.cebuano: Nagahatag siya ug makaon kanila nga may kahadlok kaniya: Sa gihapon siya mahinumdum sa iyang tugon.
word.hebrew: ה  טרף נתן ליראיו    יזכר לעולם בריתו
word.hebrewmodern: טרף נתן ליראיו יזכר לעולם בריתו׃
word.greekot: χρηστὸς ἀνὴρ ὁ οἰκτίρων καὶ κιχρῶν οἰκονομήσει τοὺς λόγους αὐτοῦ ἐν κρίσει

word.kjv: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: a good understanding have all they that do his commandments: his praise endureth for ever.
word.thailand: ความยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์เป็นที่เริ่มต้นของสติปัญญา บรรดาผู้ที่ปฏิบัติตามพระบัญญัติของพระองค์ก็ได้ความเข้าใจดี การสรรเสริญพระเจ้าดำรงอยู่เป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: El principio de la sabiduría es el temor de Jehová: Buen entendimiento tienen cuantos ponen aquéllos por obra: Su loor permanece para siempre.
word.latinvulgate: Peccator videbit, et irascetur, dentibus suis fremet et tabescet ; desiderium peccatorum peribit.
word.italian1927: Il timor dell’Eterno è il principio della sapienza; buon senno hanno tutti quelli che mettono in pratica la sua legge. La sua lode dimora in perpetuo.
word.german1912: Die Furcht des HERRN ist der Weisheit Anfang. Das ist eine feine Klugheit, wer darnach tut, des Lob bleibt ewiglich.
word.french1910: La crainte de l'Eternel est le commencement de la sagesse; Tous ceux qui l'observent ont une raison saine. Sa gloire subsiste à jamais.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 敬畏耶和華是智慧的開端；凡是這樣行的都是明智的。耶和華該受讚美，直到永遠。
word.korean: 여호와를 경외함이 곧 지혜의 근본이라 그 계명을 지키는 자는 다 좋은 지각이 있나니 여호와를 찬송함이 영원히 있으리로다
word.tagalog: Ang pagkatakot sa Panginoon ay pasimula ng karunungan; may mabuting pagkaunawa ang lahat na nagsisisunod ng kaniyang mga utos. Ang kaniyang kapurihan ay nananatili magpakailan man.
word.maori: Ko te timatanga o te whakaaro nui he wehi ki a Ihowa: he ngarahu nui to te hunga katoa nana era mahi; mau te whakamoemiti ki a ia, ake ake.
word.cebuano: Ang pagkahadlok kang Jehova mao ang sinugdanan sa kaalam; Ang tanan nga nanagtuman sa iyang mga sugo adunay maayong salabutan: Ang iyang pagdayeg nagapadayon sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: י  ראשית חכמה יראת יהוה--    שכל טוב לכל-עשיהם תהלתו    עמדת לעד
word.hebrewmodern: ראשית חכמה יראת יהוה שכל טוב לכל עשיהם תהלתו עמדת לעד׃
word.greekot: ἁμαρτωλὸς ὄψεται καὶ ὀργισθήσεται τοὺς ὀδόντας αὐτοῦ βρύξει καὶ τακήσεται ἐπιθυμία ἁμαρτωλῶν ἀπολεῖται

word.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. Blessed is the man that feareth the LORD, that delighteth greatly in his commandments.
word.thailand: จงสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์เถิด คนที่เกรงกลัวพระเยโฮวาห์ก็เป็นสุข คือผู้ปิติยินดีเป็นอันมากในพระบัญญัติของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Aleluya. BIENAVENTURADO el hombre que teme á Jehová, Y en sus mandamientos se deleita en gran manera.
word.latinvulgate: Alleluja. Laudate, pueri, Dominum, laudate nomen Domini.
word.italian1927: Alleluia. Beato l’uomo che teme l’Eterno, che si diletta grandemente nei suoi comandamenti.
word.german1912: Halleluja! Wohl dem, der den HERRN fürchtet, der große Lust hat zu seinen Geboten!
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel! Heureux l'homme qui craint l'Eternel, Qui trouve un grand plaisir à ses commandements.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 敬畏　神的必享福樂你們要讚美耶和華。敬畏耶和華、熱愛他的誡命的，這人是有福的。
word.korean: 할렐루야 ! 여호와를 경외하며 그 계명을 크게 즐거워하는 자는 복이 있도다
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo ang Panginoon. Mapalad ang tao na natatakot sa Panginoon, na naliligayang mainam sa kaniyang mga utos.
word.maori: ¶ Whakamoemititia a Ihowa. Ka hari te tangata e wehi ana i a Ihowa, e aro nui ana ki ana whakahau.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo si Jehova. Bulahan ang tawo nga may kahadlok kang Jehova, Nga diha sa iyang mga sugo nagakalipay sa hilabihan gayud.
word.hebrew: א  הללו-יה אשרי-איש ירא את-יהוה    במצותיו חפץ מאד
word.hebrewmodern: הללו יה אשרי איש ירא את יהוה במצותיו חפץ מאד׃
word.greekot: αλληλουια αἰνεῖτε παῖδες κύριον αἰνεῖτε τὸ ὄνομα κυρίου

word.kjv: Ye that fear the LORD, trust in the LORD: he is their help and their shield.
word.thailand: ท่านผู้เกรงกลัวพระเยโฮวาห์เอ๋ย จงวางใจในพระเยโฮวาห์เถิด พระองค์ทรงเป็นความอุปถัมภ์และเป็นโล่ของเขาทั้งหลาย
word.spanish1909: Los que teméis á Jehová, confiad en Jehová: El es su ayuda y su escudo.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: O voi che temete l’Eterno, confidate nell’Eterno! Egli è il loro aiuto e il loro scudo.
word.german1912: Die den HERRN fürchten, hoffen auf den HERRN! Der ist ihre Hilfe und Schild.
word.french1910: Vous qui craignez l'Eternel, confiez-vous en l'Eternel! Il est leur secours et leur bouclier.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 敬畏耶和華的啊！你們要倚靠耶和華；他是你們（“你們”原文作“他們”）的幫助、你們（“你們”原文作“他們”）的盾牌。
word.korean: 여호와를 경외하는 너희는 여호와를 의지하라 ! 그는 너희 도움이시요 너희 방패시로다
word.tagalog: Kayong nangatatakot sa Panginoon, magsitiwala kayo sa Panginoon; siya'y kanilang saklolo at kanilang kalasag.
word.maori: E te hunga e wehi ana i a Ihowa, whakawhirinaki ki a Ihowa: ko ia to ratou awhina, to ratou whakangungu rakau.
word.cebuano: Kamong mga nangahadlok kang Jehova sumalig kamo kang Jehova: Siya mao ang ilang tabang ug ang ilang kalasag.
word.hebrew: יא  יראי יהוה בטחו ביהוה    עזרם ומגנם הוא
word.hebrewmodern: יראי יהוה בטחו ביהוה עזרם ומגנם הוא׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: He will bless them that fear the LORD, both small and great.
word.thailand: พระองค์จะทรงอำนวยพระพรแก่บรรดาผู้ที่ยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์ทั้งผู้น้อยและผู้ใหญ่
word.spanish1909: Bendecirá á los que temen á Jehová; A chicos y á grandes.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: benedirà quelli che temono l’Eterno, piccoli e grandi.
word.german1912: er segnet, die den HERRN fürchten, Kleine und Große.
word.french1910: Il bénira ceux qui craignent l'Eternel, les petits et les grands;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 敬畏耶和華的，無論大小尊卑，他都必賜福。
word.korean: 대소 무론하고 여호와를 경외하는 자에게 복을 주시리로다
word.tagalog: Kaniyang pagpapalain ang nangatatakot sa Panginoon, ang mababa at gayon ang mataas.
word.maori: Ka manaakitia e ia te hunga e wehi ana ki a Ihowa, te iti, te rahi.
word.cebuano: Siya magapanalangin kanila nga may kahadlok kang Jehova, Sa mga gagmay ug sa mga dagku.
word.hebrew: יג  יברך יראי יהוה--    הקטנים עם-הגדלים
word.hebrewmodern: יברך יראי יהוה הקטנים עם הגדלים׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Let them now that fear the LORD say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: บัดนี้จงให้บรรดาผู้ที่ยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์กล่าวว่า "ความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์"
word.spanish1909: Digan ahora los que temen á Jehová: Que para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Tu mandasti mandata tua custodiri nimis.
word.italian1927: Sì, dicano quelli che temono l’Eterno: La sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: Es sagen nun, die den HERRN fürchten: Seine Güte währet ewiglich.
word.french1910: Que ceux qui craignent l'Eternel disent: Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願敬畏耶和華的說：“他的慈愛永遠長存。”
word.korean: 이제 여호와를 경외하는 자는 말하기를 그 인자하심이 영원하다 할지로다
word.tagalog: Mangagsabi ngayon ang nangatatakot sa Panginoon, na ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: Kia mea te hunga e wehi ana i a Ihowa, He pumau tonu tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Ipaingon karon kanila nga nangahadlok kang Jehova, Nga ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay kapusan.
word.hebrew: ד  יאמרו-נא יראי יהוה    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: יאמרו נא יראי יהוה כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: σὺ ἐνετείλω τὰς ἐντολάς σου φυλάξασθαι σφόδρα

word.kjv: The LORD is on my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me?
word.thailand: มีพระเยโฮวาห์อยู่ฝ่ายข้าพเจ้า ข้าพเจ้าจะไม่กลัว มนุษย์จะทำอะไรแก่ข้าพเจ้าได้เล่า
word.spanish1909: Jehová está por mí: no temeré Lo que me pueda hacer el hombre.
word.latinvulgate: Tunc non confundar, cum perspexero in omnibus mandatis tuis.
word.italian1927: L’Eterno è per me; io non temerò; che cosa mi può far l’uomo?
word.german1912: Der HERR ist mit mir, darum fürchte ich mich nicht; was können mir Menschen tun?
word.french1910: L'Eternel est pour moi, je ne crains rien: Que peuvent me faire des hommes?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華是我的幫助，我決不害怕，人能把我怎麼樣呢？
word.korean: 여호와는 내 편이시라 내게 두려움이 없나니 내게 어찌할꼬
word.tagalog: Ang Panginoon ay kakampi ko; hindi ako matatakot: anong magagawa ng tao sa akin?
word.maori: Kei ahau a Ihowa; e kore ahau e wehi: he aha ta te tangata e mea ai ki ahau?
word.cebuano: Si Jehova kadapig nako; dili ako mahadlok: Unsay arang mabuhat sa tawo kanako?
word.hebrew: ו  יהוה לי לא אירא    מה-יעשה לי אדם
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה לי לא אירא מה יעשה לי אדם׃
word.greekot: τότε οὐ μὴ ἐπαισχυνθῶ ἐν τῷ με ἐπιβλέπειν ἐπὶ πάσας τὰς ἐντολάς σου

word.kjv: Stablish thy word unto thy servant, who is devoted to thy fear.
word.thailand: ขอทรงยืนยันพระวจนะของพระองค์กับผู้รับใช้ของพระองค์ ผู้เกรงกลัวพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Confirma tu palabra á tu siervo, Que te teme.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Mantieni al tuo servitore la tua parola, che inculca il tuo timore.
word.german1912: Laß deinen Knecht dein Gebot fest für dein Wort halten, daß ich mich nicht fürchte.
word.french1910: Accomplis envers ton serviteur ta promesse, Qui est pour ceux qui te craignent!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你向你的僕人實踐你的諾言，就是你向敬畏你的人所應許的。
word.korean: 내 육체가 주를 두려워함으로 떨며 내가 또 주의 판단을 두려워하나이다
word.tagalog: Papagtibayin mo ang iyong salita sa iyong lingkod, na ukol sa takot sa iyo.
word.maori: ¶ Whakapumautia tau kupu ki tau pononga, e wehi nei ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Palig-ona ang imong pulong nganhi sa imong alagad, Nga nagatudlo sa pagkahadlok kanimo.
word.hebrew: לח  הקם לעבדך אמרתך--    אשר ליראתך
word.hebrewmodern: הקם לעבדך אמרתך אשר ליראתך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Turn away my reproach which I fear: for thy judgments are good.
word.thailand: ขอทรงหันการเยาะเย้ยซึ่งข้าพระองค์ครั่นคร้ามนั้นไปเสีย เพราะคำตัดสินของพระองค์นั้นดี
word.spanish1909: Quita de mí el oprobio que he temido: Porque buenos son tus juicios.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Rimuovi da me il vituperio ch’io temo, perché i tuoi giudizi son buoni.
word.german1912: Wende von mir die Schmach, die ich scheue; denn deine Rechte sind lieblich.
word.french1910: Eloigne de moi l'opprobre que je redoute! Car tes jugements sont pleins de bonté.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你使我所怕的羞辱離開我，因為你的典章都是美好的。
word.korean: 저희가 주의 법을 폐하였사오니 지금은 여호와의 일하실 때니이다
word.tagalog: Alisin mo ang aking kadustaan na aking kinatatakutan: sapagka't ang mga kahatulan mo'y mabuti.
word.maori: ¶ Parea atu toku tawainga, e wehi nei ahau: he pai hoki au whakaritenga.
word.cebuano: Kuhaa gikan kanako ang kaulawan nga akong nahadlokan; Kay maayo ang imong mga tulomanon.
word.hebrew: לט  העבר חרפתי אשר יגרתי    כי משפטיך טובים
word.hebrewmodern: העבר חרפתי אשר יגרתי כי משפטיך טובים׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: I am a companion of all them that fear thee, and of them that keep thy precepts.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์เป็นเพื่อนกับทุกคนผู้ยำเกรงพระองค์กับผู้ที่รักษาข้อบังคับของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Compañero soy yo de todos los que te temieren Y guardaren tus mandamientos.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io sono il compagno di tutti quelli che ti temono e di quelli che osservano i tuoi precetti.
word.german1912: Ich halte mich zu denen, die dich fürchten und deine Befehle halten.
word.french1910: Je suis l'ami de tous ceux qui te craignent, Et de ceux qui gardent tes ordonnances.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 凡是敬畏你，謹守你訓詞的，我都與他們為友。
word.korean: 내가 모든 재물을 즐거워함 같이 주의 증거의 도를 즐거워하였나이다
word.tagalog: Ako'y kasama ng lahat na nangatatakot sa iyo, at ng nagsisitupad ng iyong mga tuntunin.
word.maori: ¶ He hoa ahau no te hunga katoa e wehi ana i a koe; no te hunga ano e pupuri ana i au ako.
word.cebuano: Kauban ako sa tanang mga may kahadlok kanimo, Ug kanila nga nanagtuman sa imong mga lagda.
word.hebrew: סג  חבר אני לכל-אשר יראוך    ולשמרי פקודיך
word.hebrewmodern: חבר אני לכל אשר יראוך ולשמרי פקודיך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: They that fear thee will be glad when they see me; because I have hoped in thy word.
word.thailand: บรรดาผู้เกรงกลัวพระองค์จะเห็นข้าพระองค์และเปรมปรีดิ์ เพราะว่าข้าพระองค์ได้หวังในพระวจนะของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Los que te temen, me verán, y se alegrarán; Porque en tu palabra he esperado.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Quelli che ti temono mi vedranno e si rallegreranno, perché ho sperato nella tua parola.
word.german1912: Die dich fürchten, sehen mich und freuen sich; denn ich hoffe auf dein Wort.
word.french1910: Ceux qui te craignent me voient et se réjouissent, Car j'espère en tes promesses.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願敬畏你的人看見我就歡喜，因為我仰望你的話。
word.korean: 악을 좇는 자가 가까이 왔사오니 저희는 주의 법에서 머니이다
word.tagalog: Silang nangatatakot sa iyo ay makikita ako, at matutuwa; sapagka't ako'y umasa sa iyong salita;
word.maori: ¶ Ka hari te hunga e wehi ana i a koe ina kite i ahau: noku i tumanako ki tau kupu.
word.cebuano: Sila nga may mga kahadlok kanimo motan-aw kanako ug managkalipay, Kay diha sa imong pulong milaum ako.
word.hebrew: עד  יראיך יראוני וישמחו    כי לדברך יחלתי
word.hebrewmodern: יראיך יראוני וישמחו כי לדברך יחלתי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Let those that fear thee turn unto me, and those that have known thy testimonies.
word.thailand: ขอให้บรรดาผู้ที่ยำเกรงพระองค์หันกลับมายังข้าพระองค์ พร้อมกับผู้ที่ทราบถึงบรรดาพระโอวาทของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Tórnense á mí los que te temen Y conocen tus testimonios.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Rivolgansi a me quelli che ti temono e quelli che conoscono le tue testimonianze.
word.german1912: Ach daß sich müßten zu mir halten, die dich fürchten und deine Zeugnisse kennen!
word.french1910: Qu'ils reviennent à moi, ceux qui te craignent, Et ceux qui connaissent tes préceptes!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願敬畏你、知道你法度的人，都歸向我；
word.korean: 주의 말씀의 강령은 진리오니 주의 의로운 모든 규례가 영원하리이다
word.tagalog: Bumalik nawa sa akin yaong nangatatakot sa iyo, at silang nangakakakilala ng iyong mga patotoo.
word.maori: Ko te hunga e wehi ana ki a koe me anga ki ahau, a ka mohio ratou ki au whakaaturanga.
word.cebuano: Pabalika nganhi kanako kadtong mga nangahadlok kanimo; Ug sila manghibalo sa imong mga pagpamatuod.
word.hebrew: עט  ישובו לי יראיך    וידעו (וידעי) עדתיך
word.hebrewmodern: ישובו לי יראיך וידעו עדתיך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: My flesh trembleth for fear of thee; and I am afraid of thy judgments.
